Length is consistent with other trunk style briefs (shorter than regular boxer briefs). Normally buy Medium (33 waist), but went with Large and am glad I did (fit just right).', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Fit too small', 'author': 'suzanne', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love them . However I would strongly recommend getting a size bigger .', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Light and practical', 'author': 'ronny111', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I use them during my business trips overseas. They are easy to wash in the sink and dry overnight. Very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Would be a good pair of trunks/briefs without very UNCOMFORTABLE sewn-in tags.', 'author': 'End User', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I was a little surprised when I first saw the huge tag in the waistband, but even more surprised to find it is actually 5 full tags sewn together! And this is on the inside of the waistband, against your skin. Plus they\'re sewn in to the waistband very well so you can\'t yank them out without destroying the briefs. I put them on to see how annoying the tags may or may not be, and that\'s when I discovered the other sewn-in tag - it\'s a "Lacoste" branding tag sewn right across the middle of the rear section of the waistband. This smaller tag is actually more noticeable as you\'re wearing the briefs because the stitching results in an abrasive edge, and it sits right on your spine so you feel it anytime you\'re sitting down. And like the other 5 tags, this little needless tag is sewn in to stay, and cannot be ripped out without damage. Most manufacturers have been making underclothing without sewn-in tags for many years, so it\'s amazing that a brand as well known and established as Lacoste is putting out men\'s briefs with not jut tags, but absolute tag overkill. The briefs themselves seem well made and the fit is good, but do yourself a favor and order a men\'s brief without these annoying tags.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars What you see isn‚Äôt what you get', 'author': 'CAprimefan', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Great feel, look and quality but you aren‚Äôt getting what‚Äôs pictured. They clearly show the croc insignia on the front of the boxers and the ones you get are plain.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable, but short', 'author': 'CKE', 'rating': 4, 'content': "They are soft and comfortable to wear, but the length of the whole boxer brief is short, the legs are short, like they are cutting it short to save on fabric. There is a long tag sewn inside, I cut it off. Overall, they are a little too short for my liking and I won't purchase them again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars The gator is missing', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The gator üêä is in the picture on the bottom corner of briefs. But the actually ones I recieved don‚Äôt have the gator. Otherwise good.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Tops
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars High quality', 'author': 'MW', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm a woman who likes to order men's tees because of sleeve length. This one is the best made. The tag at the neck does not scratch like on some other shirts. Nice and soft. Lightweight, quality fabric. The medium fits somewhere between a small and medium so the fit is snug even though I I don‚Äôt have extra weight. If you‚Äôre on the fence wondering, go ahead and get a large.I‚Äôm just careful to wash them on cold and air dry them otherwise I know they‚Äôd be too small to wear.The length is great. title: Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Comfort for Active Teens', 'author': 'Chef Bobby', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve T-Shirt has become a staple in my teenager's wardrobe, and for good reason. Not only is it incredibly soft and comfortable to wear, but it has also proven to be durable, lasting over a year despite my teenager's active lifestyle. The slim-fit design offers a modern look without sacrificing comfort, making it versatile for various occasions. Whether he's lounging at home or out with friends, this shirt remains a go-to choice. If you're in search of a reliable and long-lasting long-sleeve tee for your teenager, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's a purchase you won't regret.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars If you're a skinny guy, you want these.", 'author': 'Bryan J Clifford', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I am 25 years old at 6'1 and 140 pounds. (Yes that's almost underweight)with a 38 chest and a 29 waist, these shirts fit surprisingly perfect.However, if you are looking for thin, stretchy, athletic shirts, these wont be it. They have a thick and sharp look, but are still quite comfortable.Now I must be clear and tell you that they indeed shrink quite a bit after tumble drying, but that is expected from 100% cotton. With my thin frame being as tall as I am, the shirts are flattering and snug at the chest and arms the way I want, but are still quite short in length.If you don't tuck in your shirts the way I do, go with the large. I went for medium mostly for the chest fit and because the length is irrelevant to me since I tuck in everything I wear.Overall highly recommend not just because they fit so well for a skinny tall guy, but the price was hard to steer away from. Amazon Essentials impressed me again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad and 100% cotton :)', 'author': 'Mason R', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Decent long-sleeve shirt made of a thicker cotton than most, which I like for the colder days. Also, a softer cotton too, not a rough or stiff feeling one. Kind of short-length wise, if you\'re a guy who\'s tall, when you stretch your arms, the shirt will raise and flash a little of your stomach. I\'m 6\'1" and when I raise my arms up all the way to stretch, it shows all the way up to the top of my belly button. I bought it for a around the house sleep/lounge shirt, so I don\'t really care that much.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and feel and very good price', 'author': 'Donald G. Marshall', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The fit is perfect--though I'm usually a medium. I took the advice of others and got large, and after a wash-and-dry, it fit perfectly. Nice weight and feel to the cloth. The price is unbeatable! I've gotten several more in different colors.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Shrunk', 'author': 'NYCshopper', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Great look and a nice quality thickness. I thought it would be paper thing because of the low price but it‚Äôs a normal thickness. The problem is it visibly shrunk when washing in cold water/ normal dryer cycle.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, but shrinks a lot', 'author': 'TS', 'rating': 5, 'content': "It's a good value and looks okay, but I wish the shoulders were a bit wider. Just a heads up, it shrinks one size in the dryer, even on low heat. So, I'd suggest going a size up if you're planning to dry it in a dryer after washing.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!', 'author': 'Senor Zoidbergo', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Pleasantly surprised at how nice these are. Great fit, nice color and weight of fabric, don't feel cheap at all. I bought these for working out, but I think I'll need to buy more to stock up! Also great for casual wear.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me', 'author': 'auraaura', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm kind of in between a L and XL in tshirts. I ordered a XL in this shirt and it fits me good. Material is thick and soft and surprisingly warm.. I like it and will order more.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Excessively large sleeves?', 'author': 'Brandon', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The body of the shirt fits just fine, both in tightness and length, actually being a ‚Äúslim fit‚Äù so the excess fabric at the back of the shirt doesn‚Äôt puff up like a balloon.My problem is the sleeves‚Ä¶ the bottom of the sleeve-hole stitch is several inches lower down on my sides than it should be, making the shoulder/bicep part of the sleeve extremely baggy, but it gets narrower as it goes to the forearm. I can imagine this being fine with a jacket or for casual wear. I definitely would not wear this to work.Unrelated side note: the packaging was not a discreet Amazon shipper, just the shirt in a plastic bag and the packing label.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality', 'author': 'Roger Arden', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am 6ft 4" and wasn\'t sure if this would be long enough in the arms, it is perfect. The quality of the fabric is great and super soft. Love it!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Tees | Premium Fitted Men's T-Shirt | Crew Neck | Singles & Packs
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fit and comfort', 'author': 'CrisM', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shorts are true to size. I wear XL in many brands and this one is no different other than the fact that it‚Äôs fits the arm and chest area very well and leaves a little room for the stomach area giving a flattering silhouette. The length is also well proportioned that it doesn‚Äôt leave you looking boxy. The material is very soft and did not have any shrinkage from being in the washing machine and tumble dried on low heat. The only negative is that I wish the black was a little darker and not look like it was faded from regular washing.The 4 pack in the picture of the ad should be darker colors. However, what arrived were white, heather blue instead of the grey. Should have gotten a xxl but they are very soft and comfortable and for sure tight around the upper body', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and look good.', 'author': 'Wayne O.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was skeptical at first because of all of the advertisements I was seeing, and the price was a little steep, but these are very comfortable, they look and feel great. I have only owned them for a couple of weeks, so I can not comment on how durable or long lasting they will be, but I'm very happy with these shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars **Best Tshirt Hands Down**', 'author': 'Drew wallace', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is probably the most quality shirt I have ever owned. My wife loves the way they make me look. I really don't know how they did it but these shirts make it look like you work out! I am rocking the Dad bod and they truly hide the gut. I have been wearing them for 6 months now and they have yet to wear out. I know these things cost a lot of money to some but I caught them on sale and they are worth every penny. I would say they run a little small so you may need to size up, but it's because of the way they fit to you and hug all the right places. 10/10 would purchase again!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality', 'author': 'Chelsea Whitmill', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I buy these for my husband and teenage son. I am so glad they‚Äôre available on Amazon now as we used to order from their website directly. We have bought several bundles. They are soft, they fit well and don‚Äôt fade or shrink in the wash.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Listen to the reviews about the quality control!', 'author': 'Yosomboon C.', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I was skeptical about ordering True Classic because of the reviews I‚Äôve read about their quality control. I wanted to give them a shot anyways so I ordered the 5 pack of XXL black shirts. After I tried it on it was way too big from the XXL I‚Äôm accustomed to from Into The AM. I returned it and bought a 6 pack of assorted colors in XL as recommended by Amazon and those were so tight on me that I looked like a sausage. I returned those and bought a 3rd pack of XXL assorted colors. I figured after I wear them once and gave them a wash they‚Äôll shrink to down to fit like a glove, but while trying them on The black shirt fresh out of the package was all faded while the collar was solid black. Long story short I‚Äôm going to return these for the 3rd time and spend $30 more for Into the AM assorted packs like I did in the past. I‚Äôve had into the AM shirts for close to 3 years and they‚Äôve fit me as well as they did on day one and aged very well with minimal fade.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good shirt, bad stitching', 'author': 'Chris', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'UPDATE: After this review, I was contacted and asked if I would like a refund of my order. I declined and said the shirt is usable because my wife sewed it so I felt a refund was unnecessary. However, the seller insisted and offered to send me a replacement shirt, which I.accepted. The replacement has no defect.I increased the rating from 3 stars to 4 stars for excellent customer service and standing behind the product.Original review:This shirt fits well; tight fit in the upper body (chest, shoulders, arms) and looser in the waist.However, the stitching at the armpit was poorly done and there was an opening just under the left armpit.I was going to return it but my wife liked how the shirt fit me and she wanted me to wear it so she just sewed it up.These are well-designed but poorly made and not worth the price, in my opinion.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Solid material, varying sizes', 'author': 'Max Rodgers', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These t-shirts are incredibly comfy and I love all of the colors that the variety pack came with. I have a fairly long torso and shirts tend to be on the shorter side if they don't fit. I found that 3/5 of the shirts in this pack fit me perfectly, but the other 2 are a bit short in the torso. The quality of the material feels really nice; however, I have noticed a few stitches coming out of place after about 4-months of wearing these. I'd like to see the consistency of these shirts be a bit higher to really give them 5-stars, but compared to my other t-shirts I think the quality is definitely there.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great Shirts!', 'author': 'Q', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love these shirts. They fit great and hug the body just right. The only downside is there are some minor imperfections in the stitching quality so I have hanging threads. The other problem I had, unrelated to quality, is that one of my five shirts in the pack was the wrong size so I had to contact Amazon. They refunded me the cost of the shirt, but that color was the main reason for my order lol. All in all, great, comfortable shirts!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's 3-Pack Stretchy Undershirts Crew Neck Long Back Hem T-Shirts
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good Fit, but quality?', 'author': 'Alan J. Hoffman', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The shirts are soft and fit well. title: Men's Cotton, Moisture-Wicking Crew Tee Undershirts, Multi-Packs Available
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars What a great everyday t-shirt from Hanes, I just keep buying more!', 'author': 'Shawn Hoff', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These Hanes T-Shirts are extremely comfortable, reasonably affordable, and seem perfectly designed- for everyday use. My partner and I have so many of these. I wear a Large, she wears a Medium or Small. They are soft, comfortable and easy to wear/easy to pair. They make a great night shirt too! The first few times wearing these, even just on their own, you will see truly, they present well actually. So many things you can do with a simple white shirt. Even to tie-dye! They will however become softer overtime. Making the choice of do I purchase more, the true question? YES! They are worth it! My only real complaint is they shrink overtime, as will any other shirt made with cotton. So please make note of that, the smalls are great, but will get smaller, the mediums are just a inch or two too big for my partner, so she keeps both sizes in stock, haha. She is 5'7 and 120-140 lbs. When 120- wears small, when 140-wears medium. I wear a large and weigh 140-165. When I am 140 I fit into a medium but a large is more comfortable, when I am 165 the large is just right. I am also 5'7.I hope this helps! I do use bleach on occasion to help freshen them up, it will help bring back out that pearly white tone again on only the newer ones, but eventually purchasing a few more is always the best decision as they fade over time! Only bad thing I would say is when washed with other bright colors, they will fade. Keeping them separate and wash with whites in cold water to prevent loosing that bright white color. Iron if necessary to give it that fresh out the bag look again!I am 100% happy with these shirts and would recommend these to anyone! These are amazing as usual; we give them 5 stars! Thanks Hanes! We love your products! Keep up the hard work!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great everyday/gym shirts', 'author': 'Dan', 'rating': 5, 'content': "5'10, 160, muscular build. medium fits comfortable around the body not being too tight, but hugs the sleeves nice and hits mid-bicep. comfortable for everyday use. the white ones are extremely thin and basically see thru (only good as undershirts), but the black ones are perfect.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great t shirt for women!', 'author': 'Kim G', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These t-shirts are perfect for ladies to wear underneath sweaters or alone with jeans. title: Adult Ultra Cotton T-shirt, Style G2000, Multipack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality', 'author': 'Chris Nelson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am 6‚Äô1‚Äù and weigh 180lbs, large sizes fits me perfectly. Shirts are Ultra Cotton. They‚Äôre a little softer than the Heavy Cotton version. They are thick, durable and soft. These are not the thin type of undershirts you find it multiple packs at the store. These are real r-shirts. My work uses them for our work shirts, they last a longtime. These shirts do not shirk much. I still would recommend washing and drying on the cooler settings.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 25, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It said for men medium but it look like a kid shirt. Got size medium. So return back', 'author': 'Constancia', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It said for men medium but it look like a kid shirt. Got size medium. So return back', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 19, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Solid value T-shirts', 'author': 'Solomon Kane', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I recommend these T-shirts. I am 5\'8" and 140", I do not like tight T-shirts so I bought a large. I am happy with it, although I am sure that a medium would have worked.I will compare the Gilden T-shirt with the Fruit of the Loom Platinum that you will see at Wal-Mart.Pro - The Gilden appears to be better built and the sizing was consistent on the two T-shirts that came in the package. The neck was smaller, without being tight. I am guessing that fabric around the neck will not wrinkle up, unlike many Fruit of the Looms. There were no loose threads, unlike many Fruit of the Loom. Gilden has heavier fabric, which is better most of the year where I live (east Tennessee). I do not want a see-through T-shirt. Also, no one who sees me would want me wearing a see-through T-shirt.Con - The Fruit of the Loom is much softer after a first washing. I washed the Gildan T-shirt in warm water with two minutes in the dryer on Energy-Saving. Gilden has a tag which is not as good as Fruit of the Loom (no tag). I cut the tag out without any problem and now the Gilden is fine. Gilden is slightly more expensive but both brands are inexpensive.Neutral - Neither brand bleeds color. I have only washed the Gilden one time so I do not know whether it will fade. My Fruit of the Loom T-shirts fade but it takes many washes for that to occur.I hope that this review is helpful to you.Update - June 2, 2020. The Gildan T-shirts that I bought previously held up reasonably well for the money. They did not shrink. They did not fade. However, they did not get softer. Washing was on warm and drying was three minutes on energy saver.I purchased some more Gildans to replace the ones that wore out. I have not washed them yet. I bought Galapagos Blue and Orange in Large size. Both are 100% cotton. The necks seem smaller than the Fruit of the Loom Platinums that I own. I like that because I have a small head so I don\'t need a big neck. I am still 5\'8" and 140 pounds and the Large is comfortable for me. A medium would probably fit me better; however, I like a looser-fitting T-shirt.I will let you know how well the new Gildans do after washing in warm water and drying for three minutes on energy saving heat.Notably, I have some old Fruit of the Loom T-shirts (like ten years or more) which are reasonably thick, reasonably soft, and still going strong after all this time. I wish that I had bought more of them.June 10, 2020 - After one wash in warm water and three minutes in the dryer, the new Gildans did not shrink or fade. Also, the necks did not stretch. However, the T-shirts did not become softer. Therefore, three out of the four results were good and one result was neutral.September 20, 2020 - After multiple washings in warm water and three minutes in the dryer on "energy saving", the verdict is the same. Good - the T-shirts did not shrink or fade and the necks did not stretch. Bad - The T-shirts did not get any softer. One other note - the tags on the T-shirts would be very annoying to wear so I cut the tags out.November 22, 2020 - The first thing to go bad on these T-shirts has been that the necks have stretched slightly. The stretching was not terrible but it is noticeable (at least to me). Nevertheless, I would give the T-shirts 4.5 stars. They do seem a little but softer or maybe I am getting more used to them. They do not feel scratchy to me. They have not faded or shrunk. I definitely like them much better than the ultra-thin Fruit of the Loom Platinum.November 28, 2020 - I have purchased only Large-size Gildan T-shirts. I am very happy that the sizing has been very consistent. Gildan has much better quality control than Fruit of the Loom.March 11, 2021 - I have revised the rating to a five stars. The T-shirts have gotten soft after probably 10 - 12 washings. The necks have stretched slightly but not very much. I am picky about that so I may notice that more than most people would. I dry the T-shirts by putting them in the dryer on energy saving setting for three minutes and then laying them on a bamboo drying rack. I do NOT dry them by putting them on hangers. The T-shirts still look great with no fading. I wear them frequently and enjoy the various colors.September 16, 2021 - The T-shirts are still doing well. One note, I think that the 6.0 weight fabric is much better than the 5.3 weight fabric. I bought some 5.3 weight lime green T-shirts to try to make myself more visible when walking. The necks have sagged after four washes. They served the purpose for the summer. However, I would not buy the 5.3 ounce again. The 6.0 ounce T-shirts have maintained their shape with minimal neck sagging or crinkling.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 8, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Fits nice and a great value', 'author': 'David F', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts fit nice, are comfortable, look good, and are a great value. Still, the neck is too tight at the front, which is annoying...so I stretch them out by hand...which is certainly damaging my "personal appearance" standing in the community.Otherwise, these are nice t shirts and fit properly in every other respect.Due to annoyance factor, will not buy again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 5, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for buck t-shirt', 'author': 'Caz', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These are medium weight cotton shirts so they won't be super soft and they will shrink in the dryer. title: Unisex T-Shirt, Beefy Crewneck Cotton T-Shirt, Unisex Crewneck Cotton Tee, Unisex Classic Crewneck Cotton Tee
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Consistent and Durable shirt at a good price', 'author': 'HPLoveshack', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I keep coming back to buy more of these. These are great work shirts and just general usage shirts and the only decent t-shirt with a pocket anymore.* Durability for cheap. For $7 a shirt you get a fairly beefy cotton that doesn\'t rip the instant it catches on anything. It holds up well in the wash. The dye doesn\'t seem to fade. I can\'t tell the difference between two year old and two month old shirts.* Pocket is nice. It\'s big enough to stuff your phone into it, but its better suited to light items that won\'t fall out due to gravity if you bend forward and stuff that you can clip to the edge of the pocket. Business cards, paper notes, pens, and small flashlights with pocket clips all do well in the pocket. If you put a phone in it expect it to flop out on the concrete if you bend forward more than 45 degrees.* Consistency. I\'ve bought 8 of these so far, two at a time over the course of about two years as I replaced my other work t-shirts. The sizing has not been altered in that time, nor has the material weight. I can\'t even tell the difference between the shirts from two years ago and the most recent ones, they don\'t even seem to have worn.* Modest cut. They lean toward the boxy side which is fine if you aren\'t trying to show off. If you\'re a little on the pudgy side it\'s actually preferable. When I first got these I was about 195 at 6\'1", two years later I\'ve slimmed down while hitting the weights and sitting at 175 with a little more muscle in my upper torso and considerably less fat around my waist. If you want to turn any heads or catch any eyes this is not your go to t-shirt.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2017', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT', 'author': 'Jonathan Huie', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Everything about this shirt is great. title: Men's T-shirt, Cotton Midweight Men's Crewneck Tee, T-shirt for Men, Script (Reg. or Big & Tall)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Essential Tee for Men', 'author': 'Real Deal', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Champion Men's Midweight Cotton Crewneck T-Shirt, and I have to say it's one of the best basic tees I've owned. This shirt strikes the perfect balance between comfort, fit, and style, making it an essential wardrobe staple for men.First and foremost, the cotton fabric is of excellent quality. It's soft, breathable, and feels great against the skin. The midweight thickness is just right - not too heavy, not too light - making it suitable for year-round wear. Whether I wear it on its own during warmer months or layer it under a jacket in colder weather, it always feels comfortable and keeps me at the perfect temperature.The fit is spot on as well. The crewneck tee is cut in a way that offers a flattering shape without being too tight or too loose. The sleeves have just the right length, hitting the mid-bicep, which I find very comfortable and stylish.I also appreciate that Champion offers this tee in both regular and big & tall sizes, ensuring a perfect fit for all body types. The inclusivity in sizing is a big plus, and it's a testament to Champion's commitment to providing comfortable clothing for all men.The design is simple yet classic, with the iconic Champion logo subtly embroidered on the sleeve. This minimalistic approach allows the shirt to be versatile, easily paired with jeans, shorts, or activewear for various occasions.Moreover, this tee holds up well to washing and retains its shape and color. The durable construction and high-quality fabric ensure that it will last for a long time, making it a great investment.Overall, I highly recommend the Champion Men's Midweight Cotton Crewneck T-Shirt to any man looking for a high-quality, comfortable, and versatile basic tee. Whether for everyday wear, casual outings, or workouts, this shirt has become a go-to item in my wardrobe. I'll definitely be purchasing more of these in different colors!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Men's T-Shirt - An Easy 5 Stars", 'author': 'ori', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've recently had the pleasure of wearing a men's T-shirt that checks all the boxes for what a perfect T-shirt should be. It not only met but surpassed my expectations, fully earning a five-star rating.The first thing to note about this T-shirt is the excellent quality of the material. The fabric is incredibly soft to the touch, breathable, and comfortable against the skin. It's lightweight yet durable, making it ideal for a variety of activities, from lounging at home to more active pursuits.Fit is crucial when it comes to T-shirts, and this one nails it perfectly. O'Leary", 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Well, Carhart, not unlike Bud Light, you got a little fancy with your design and let some person in your organization justify their new high-paying job as a T-shirt designer. And you put a stitch in the pocket so now it doesn‚Äôt fit as big of a pocket notebook as I‚Äôm used to carrying around . They are comfortable relatively speaking. They just got too fancy. I won‚Äôt be purchasing them again unless I can find your old design, which was simple and straightforward, drop shouldered with a large pocket. Message to Carhartt designers ‚Äúif it ain‚Äôt broke, don‚Äôt fix it!‚ÄùOh, on a final note, fire the designer that talked you in to the fancy shirt.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Adult Ultra Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G2400, Multipack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Quite nice, slightly loose-fitting long-sleeved T-Shirts. Reasonably priced.', 'author': 'Randall W. Rasner', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Review of Gildan Adult Ultra Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G2400, MultipackThese long-sleeved T-Shirts are quite nice. I normally wear a 2XL, and ordered a 2XL, and found the fit slightly loose. But that is how I prefer my shirts and T-Shirts to fit. These are soft and comfortable. I washed these in cold water and followed with a wet dry setting on the dryer. Then I hung them up to finish drying, which took little time. The one thing I do not like about these is the tag in the back. I would prefer the printed tag. These have 2 big tags, and when I say big, I mean they are long and stick out a way. They did not seem to irritate the back of my neck like most do though. I might end up cutting them off regardless. They feel as though they will be durable. I felt the price was reasonable for 2 T-Shirts that are long-sleeved.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Gildan = Great Quality', 'author': 'Lisa', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These shirts are of great quality. I got these for layering on cold days and they are exactly what I was looking for. I'd consider the thickness to be a medium. I saw some reviewers comment they were thin, but to me they are thicker than a regular T-shirt. They do run a tad bit on the larger size, especially in the arms (width, not length). The length is as expected. But better a tad large, than too small, IMO. Also, they are not the softest shirt as they are bit on the coarser side. Not rough or scratchy by any means, just not super soft. A few washings has helped and I expect these shirts will last for a while. Overall, I'd definitely buy these again as they are perfect for my needs.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Confortable', 'author': 'Sergio Urena', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Good quality and confortable product, and very good price.And perfect size', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price', 'author': 'G. G', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Sized well, some shrinkage lengthwise and in the chest but no shrinkage in the sleeves. Okay construction and material, good buy considering the low price during sale.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality shirts', 'author': 'R. Martin', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts fit nicely and look great. I love wearing layers in the winter and these shirts are prefect either by themselves, or with another shirt or sweater over them. Nice colors and very limited or no shrinkage. They are quality comfortable feeling cotton.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful shirts', 'author': 'tony', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts are fantastic, heavier than most and sized generously. Don‚Äôt shrink if you don‚Äôt use a dryer. Seem very well made. Love em, will be getting more', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Shirts', 'author': 'yllwdg', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Fit as described. Washed several times and holds color well. Will shrink just a bit after washing. Overall nice shirts for the price. Nice to have the color choices.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Quality - Fit - Price', 'author': 'Steve Case', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am amazed that in this day and age of shoddy, high priced, disposable commodities that one can still find shirts of this quality at such an affordable price.These shirts are a nice weight, the fit is excellent, the material is soft, they keep their shape, and they launder well.I highly recommend these shirts and would, and will, definitely purchase this brand of shirt again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This shirt is comfortable and does not shrink very much', 'author': 'GLAFLA', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is an excellent shirt for a bargain price, especially when bought in the 10-pack. There are no side seams to itch you. The back neck and shoulders are covered in fabric which is not always the case in undershirts. The front neck, armholes, cuffs, sleeve seams, and bottom hem are not fabric covered, but they are surged with a very soft thread which is much more comfortable than the surging in some of my other shirts that scratches and itches my skin. I was worried that the crew neck would annoy me since I don\'t like anything tight around my neck, but it is loose enough that I can get it over my head with my glasses on, plus you can stretch it a little both ways when the shirt is wet. The cotton in this shirt is soft and surprisingly heavy, not like a typical men\'s undershirt. It is more an outer shirt than an undershirt, but it could be worn under a roomy outer shirt. It has cuffs, which is a very nice feature especially if the sleeves are a little long on someone. The weight and texture of the shirt seems to be between a tee shirt and a very light weight sweatshirt. I am using one for sleeping and it feels soft against my face at night and keeps me warm but not hot. The arms are long on me which I expected since I am only 5 feet 4 inches tall and I ordered the size large shirt. The size chart indicated I should order a medium or even a small if I wanted a snug shirt, but I went with the large for the comfort and I\'m happy with the roominess. The sleeve width is roomy enough on me, but not too roomy. The construction of this shirt is excellent, in fact perfect except for a thread or two that was not cut off. I bought my shirts in the 10-pack and they arrived with all ten shirts ironed and folded in half neatly, all in one big plastic bag loosely taped shut and inside a big box. I didn\'t have a problem with the fact that each shirt was not individually wrapped, and in fact I can use the big plastic bag. Some reviewers said there were holes, unsewn seams and stains on their shirts, but mine were all in perfect new condition. I washed them and dried them in the dryer, but they do take a very long time to dry. I ended up hanging them up to complete the drying. The only negative thing I can say about this excellent shirt is that it has two very annoying scratchy tags sewn right into the back neck seam. You can\'t tear them off without ripping the stitches. I cut them out very carefully with tiny scissors. Here are the approximate dimensions of size large after washing and drying: underarm sleeve length 23", sleeve circumference at shoulder 20.5", sleeve circumference at middle of sleeve 15", back width at top between sleeve seams 20.25", circumference around the bottom 45.5", length at back middle 29".', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a man who just can't bother", 'author': 'Jason', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Don't know what to wear? Just throw on one of these in black, ash-gray, navy, etc with some matching pants and you are golden. These long-sleeved shirts are especially flexible since you can quite easily roll up your sleeves, and women respond positively to the reveal of your forearms. ;)As a man I found my life greatly simplified as I replaced all my differing shirts and tops with these. I literally wear only these Gildan shirts anymore, and simplifying my wardrobe like this eliminated the stress of putting together an outfit. Also, I keep some in the factory bag and I like to treat myself to a fresh one with the factory smell once every so often. Simple pleasures of a simplified life.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Dri-Power Cotton Blend Tees & Tanks, Moisture Wicking, Odor Protection, UPF 30+, Sizes S-4x
reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Decent shirts for the price and finally a shirt that's true to size!", 'author': 'Bryan M', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Are these the highest quality shirts out there? No. Are they nice shirts for lounging around the house without spending a fortune? Absolutely! I've always loved Russell Athletic but last year a certain box store that rhymes with ball cart stopped carrying their merchandise and I've been floundering ever since. For reasons unknown, men's clothes seem to be getting smaller and smaller. I have 10+ year old 2XL sports jerseys that still fit fine yet today's 3XL's usually fits me like an old school XL. I ordered these in a 3XL fully expecting to have to return them but they actually fit!!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing!', 'author': 'Shaina', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered these shirts in three different sizes to compare. Xxl (which fit just right!). 3x (which left a little room in the stomach area). Then one in a 4x (which was huge and perfect for sleeping in itself alone!). I'm a woman (thick, curvy in all the right places, large chested, and 300lbs). I have a hard time finding tops that fit me up top. So I needed something to fit me up top and still be long enough to hit at my hips. These were amazing! They are light weight and very durable. Didn't shrink at all in the dryer. Color doesn't fade. Highly recommend and will definitely be purchasing more in the future! Nothing negative to say about these!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt!!', 'author': 'KI', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My husband loves this muscle shirt, just ordered 2 more. GREAT price!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Form fitting undershirt style, add one size up for normal fit', 'author': 'George V', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Got this shirt and was anxious to try it on for fit. I was shocked. I normally wear a XL and ordered that. So I was surprised to try it on and get a tight, form fitting shirt that felt like an undershrt, not a normal T Shirt. Unless you want a body hugging fit, get 1-2 sizes up. Also the material felt scratchy, but that was somewhat expected at this price point. UPDATE: I ordered an XXL and it was great. Fit well, not tight, but not too loose. And I like the longer length!! It is a couple of inches longer than a normal T shirt and when jumping and rolling and exercising I never have to worry about by abdomen getting exposed. AND the intial "scratchiness" disappeared after a couple of washes with softner. I have since re-order more for a total of 4 shirts now!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable tank top', 'author': 'Piano Player', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Not sure why, but basic red tank tops are almost impossible to find in brick-and-mortar stores these days. I ordered a Large for this shirt and it's holding up fine, even after washing and drying.Material is not quite as heavy as some other tank tops I own, but this shirt works well for me (especially at the gym).", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This Is A Quality Workout Shirt', 'author': 'Cade', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This was a good purchase for me. I am 6\'1" - 185 lbs. I workout hard, so I am bigger than most guys. This shirt fit just right. Maybe a little tight in the arms and chest. It is a blend. If it was 100% cotton, I would get XL and allow for the shrinkage. I do not worry about washing or over-drying it like I would a cotton shirt. It was a great price, also. Better than I could get at the WalMart near me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fit. Looks good. title: Men's V-Neck T-Shirts, Multipack, Style G1103
reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Gildan Men's V-Neck T-Shirts, Multipack, Style G1103", 'author': 'Sherri Laird', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Excellent cotton mens white v necked t-shirt. This works perfectly! It isn't super long which is the problem i have with some men's shirts. The material feels pretty sturdy, like it won't stretch out but still soft and flexible, and the V neck is perfect since sometimes men's shirts tend to choke me. For sizing, I'm typically a women's xl due to my chest size and curves, but i am a men's Medium and it's a comfortable fit.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars V for Very Comfy: Gildan Men's V-Neck T-Shirts", 'author': 'The Curious Reviewer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Gildan Men's V-Neck T-Shirts Multipack, and after wearing them for a while, I can confidently say they are a great addition to my everyday wardrobe. These shirts strike a perfect balance between comfort and style, making them suitable for various occasions.Comfort (5/5):One of the standout features of these shirts is the exceptional comfort they provide. The fabric is soft against the skin, and the V-neck design adds a touch of modern style. The shirts are lightweight and breathable, making them ideal for all-day wear. Whether you're running errands, lounging at home, or heading out with friends, these shirts keep you comfortable without sacrificing style.Durability (4/5):I appreciate the durability of the Gildan Men's V-Neck T-Shirts. The stitching is well-done, and the shirts hold up well after multiple washes. While they may show some signs of wear over time, it's worth noting that these shirts maintain their shape and color, providing good value for the price.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Gildan Men's V-Neck T-Shirts Multipack is a reliable and affordable option for everyday wear. The comfort, versatility, and durability make them a solid choice for anyone looking for quality basics. Whether you're dressing them up or down, these shirts deliver on both style and practicality. I highly recommend them for those seeking a budget-friendly yet stylish addition to their wardrobe.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good for value', 'author': 'Kelly', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts are true to size. My husband says they are comfortable. Color has stayed through multiple washes and seems to keep its shape (not stretch out) Would but again', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Fit totally depends on where it was manufactured', 'author': 'High Rise Dweller', 'rating': 3, 'content': "I ordered 3 packs of these within a few weeks of each other, several months ago.I've noticed that several of them are now fitting tighter and assumed I washed them in too warm water or left them in the dryer too long.As I sorted them, to get rid of the tight ones, I noticed the place of mfg was different and that determined the fit, not my laundering!Bottom line -the six labeled Bangladesh are all too small now tho they fit fine at first trythe six labeled Honduras fit greatthe six labeled Salvador fit great, but the printed label ink is flaking off (which I don't care about)Going to order more, but if labeled Bangladesh, they're going back!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality', 'author': 'Kimberly Hammond', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very nice tee shirts. Definitely will buy again!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with these', 'author': 'wendy', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I‚Äôve been wearing men‚Äôs, V-neck, white T-shirts to sleep in for years. title: Men's Essentials T-shirt Pack, Crewneck Cotton T-shirts for Men, 4 Or 6 Pack Available
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice', 'author': 'Gwendolyn Whitehead', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like these T-shirts. I ordered them for my son. He love's them as well. They are well made with a great price. He says that they are comfortable, cool he like how well they fit. Nice buy, no, great buy!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value!', 'author': 'Amy', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Had a friend mention these tees, and the price for a 4 pack was amazing... the large fits my skinny husband perfectly, even easily covering his concealed pistol he carries in his waistband.The fabric isn't too thick or too thin... just a classic cut and a durable product! I've come back and bought him more 4 packs in different colors... finally, no more daily laundry bc his fave fitting shirts are dirty... there's plenty to go around!Superior quality and value!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars A Little Tight On The Top', 'author': 'Trident9151', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Purchased the Hanes Essentials Men's T-Shirt Pack in Black, and overall, I'm quite satisfied with my purchase. The pack comes with a set of classic black tees, and the quality is fantastic. The fabric feels soft and durable, and after a few washes, they still look brand new.However, I did notice a minor issue with the fit. The shirts are a bit tight at the top, especially around the shoulders and chest. As someone with a broader build, I found the snugness a little uncomfortable, especially during more active movements. It might be worth considering sizing up if you're in between sizes or prefer a looser fit.Despite the fit issue, I still appreciate the overall design and style of these shirts. The crew neck is classic and versatile, making it suitable for casual wear or even for layering with other outfits. The black color looks sharp and doesn't fade easily, maintaining its original richness.I was also pleased with how well these shirts retained their shape after several washes. They didn't shrink, and the collar didn't lose its structure, which is a problem I've encountered with some other brands.In terms of value for money, the Hanes Essentials Men's T-Shirt Pack is undoubtedly worth it. You get a set of good-quality shirts at a reasonable price, and despite the slight fit issue, I would consider purchasing them again in the future. If Hanes could improve the fit at the top without compromising the rest of the shirt's comfort, they would be perfect.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable shirts', 'author': 'Dan C', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Nice and comfortable shirts, great fit and accurate sizing.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars There still together!', 'author': 'Thomas Johnson', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Look I bought these and figured as cheap as I got them they would fall apart.But they didn't!Been wearing them every day for a year.And no rips or problems!I guess the reason they were so cheap was because they have tags.But I grew up with tags on shirts so I'm good with it.Yes they are Hanes T-shirts!I definitely would buy again!Thank You Hanes!AndThank You Amazon!For the low price and the great quality!‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èüôÇüôÇüôÇ", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Random Colors are not as pictured.', 'author': 'PENNY WILSON', 'rating': 3, 'content': "We got this and are only moderately pleased. We were looking for darker colored shirts for work that weren't just black or white. The picture shows the brightest color to be orange, with a lot of green and browns and a red. What we got were three black shirts, two white, two shades of neon yellow, a neon pink, a bright blue, a purple, a bright green, and a gray. Not a single 'dark color' other than the blacks, which we were avoiding.Shirts are 12 DIFFERENT brands. So far all of them fit as intended for size, though I noticed the bright blue is shorter then the others, but still a good length. Some tags have been cut in half.That said, they are all soft, light and comfortable. I have not ran them through a washer yet so I am unsure how they will hold up, but for the most part, they ARE good shirts. Quality is fair for price!It's a pretty good buy for good shirts, I just was sad about the color choices given. Out of all 12 there is basically one that can be worn to work (not including the black and whites I already had and did not need more of), the rest are now weekend and around the house shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good size and exactly what you expect', 'author': 'Rachel Peugh', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I got these for myself as pj tops, for reference I‚Äôm 5,6‚Äù and usually wear a woman‚Äôs Large or XL. However I am 6 months pregnant and my pj tops are now too small. These are not the softest fabric I‚Äôve felt but it‚Äôs not bad either. It‚Äôs what I would expect for the price.Color is defiantly a charcoal, maybe a hair lighter than the image. The size will fit me all the way through my pregnancy and I‚Äôll still have tons of room. The length covers my bum and the sleeves end at my elbow crease. A great price for four shirts. I would buy again.I‚Äôm rating the middle on the fit options as I believe that‚Äôs where it would fit if I was wearing the appropriate size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Go a size down', 'author': 'Ruby Williams', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It is a pretty full short, so go a size down', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Almost 5 stars', 'author': 'Sylvia Guerrero', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I'm a plus size apple shape woman and finding tops that can fully cover my long torso has been extremely frustrating. I decided to go for men's shirts for the length and coverage. I use these for the gym and though they're crew neck, it really doesn't irritate my neck. The shirts are soft, breathable, fabric feels nice against my skin and allows me to move around easily. My only complaint is that they stink sourly when you first open up the pack. Which is the reason why I'm not giving 5 stars. I believe it may be due to packing which is understandable. I already washed two and the smell is still there but not as bad at it was before. I'm thinking a few more washes should do the trick. Overall great T shirts, I do recommend and I'll be buying more in the near future.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Run big', 'author': 'FlyNRightly', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I‚Äôm a 43-44 chest. I usually wear an XL in most tees. These are a tad larger than other brands at least from what I‚Äôve found. They are NOT cheap and thin. Anyone saying so is full of donkey dust. They have a nice thick crew neck as well.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

Vary high quality!', 'author': 'Jeffie', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I first bought a cotton Gildan tshirt from target 3 or 4 years ago and have worn it as a casual shirt and as a workout/yoga shirt several times per week since. I loved this shirt. It looked so good on me, the fit was perfect, it stretched just the perfect amount. And after all these years it is still holding strong as the day I bought it. I was curious if I‚Äôd be able to find more shorts like this so I pulled up Amazon and searched for the wording on the tag. Lo and behold, there they are. Exactly, the size, fit, color, and material as the one I bought at target all those years ago. And at and incredibly low price‚Ä¶for two of them. I just got done wearing one to my first yoga class and it was the identical experience as my old shirt. I am so thankful to have found these shirts here. So happy!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Needed a red tee shirt for an event hike. shirt looked nice until it came out of the dryer wrinkled', 'author': 'Marilyn the librarian', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I liked the color and softness of fabric. Care label is hard to read as it is black with white print and symbols for washing instructions. I need to now iron the tee. It should still work for the pilgrimage hike,', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Remember that fabric content depends on whether the chosen color is solid, or "heathered", etc.', 'author': 'K. L.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We buy these mostly as undershirts, but sometimes as tees for hot days. As a result, sometimes we get plain cotton in white for my husband and in black for myself (a female), and sometimes a cotton poly blend. So far, we like all of them. I noted in the Gildan boxer brief reviews that someone commented on oddities of sizing both for briefs and tees common in most brands. In boxer briefs, the waist size "range" may be "42 to 44" for example, but the real waist size would be 43", which is the "mean". They speculated that since the tees are advertised as being for women as well as for men, but the chart basically shows chest measurements, women might find it difficult to make appropriate purchases. In reality, it just takes a little thought and understanding of one\'s own body build plus personal preferences. My husband, like many older men, has a bit of a tummy and prefers a fairly loose fit. He\'s 5\' 9" and 195 lb. For his own use, we buy an XL. When buying a more body conscious tee from a brand such as "Into the AM", he\'s happiest in an XXL. When I buy a men\'s tee for myself, it is because most women\'s tees don\'t suit my body type. I hate cap sleeves, for one thing, and prefer a men\'s style. Most importantly, my largest dimension is my bust, not my hips. Women\'s tees that fit my bust have a heck of a lot of material at the hip to accommodate a "curvy" build, which in most women includes generous hips, thighs, and butt. I have an athletic build. My natural bust has the kind of shape most women only get with a minimizer bra, so although I\'m about a 38D/40C depending on the brand of bra, when I buy men\'s tees, I\'m very happy with a L. In most brands of tees, the men\'s tee falls nicely from my bust area and the tail doesn\'t cling to my hips or backside at all. In fact, I\'ve been known to tuck the tee into my Gildan men\'s boxer briefs. After all, women\'s underwear tends to be scratchy, cheap, and made with the assumption that one\'s waist is 10" to 12" smaller than one\'s hips. While once true in my case, I\'m in my 70s, and women\'s clothing manufacturers refuse to recognize certain facts of life. I generally wear pants, jeans, or joggers, which suit both my personal preferences and build and work well with men\'s boxer briefs and tees. I\'ve also discovered that when I want a tee to wear as a tunic, I can buy size LT and wear it "tail out", since I\'m relatively short. (BTW, the size L in boxer briefs fit me very well. I still have 36" hips, but my lower abdomen isn\'t quite as flat as it used to be, and my waist isn\'t 25" anymore. Women\'s bodies alter as they age due to hormonal changes, you know, just as men tend to lose muscle mass, their butts get flatter, and their tummies get the "father figure".) Now you probably know more than you want to regarding the fit issues for underwear and that sort of thing, but maybe all this will help a puzzled few.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Regular-Fit Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love the shirts. So soft, but size up!', 'author': 'Claire Kozel', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought one of the colors for my boyfriend and he loves them so much we have since purchased three more colors. He is 5‚Äô9‚Äù, weighs 175 and we ended up sizing up to a large because they do shrink a little in the wash. The sleeves run on the shorter side especially after washing, so if you have really long arms I would size up as well. The fabric is SO soft and he says they are very comfortable. He layers them under jackets or they look nice on their own with jeans, etc. Highly recommend for the price!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Almost perfect t-shirt', 'author': 'Lee Barber', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It\'s almost a perfect long sleeve t-shirt. I don\'t like slim fit t-shirts. I like the classic, boxy, loose fitting t-shirts.; this one is like that. I\'m not a large guy, but I got an XL because I have broad shoulders and like somewhat baggy clothes. It fits perfectly on my shoulders and hangs nicely, with a boxy relaxed fit that doesn\'t stretch across the chest. The material is just thick enough to feel durable, but still pretty soft.I say "almost perfect" though for two reasons. First, I wish it had those stretchy cuffs. Second, I wish the length was half an inch, maybe a one full inch longer. These are really very minor, personal issues of taste.The shirt looks and feels good if you\'re looking for classic, relaxed fit t-shirt. Size up if you want a looser fit, it won\'t be too big.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable fabric, well made, BUT... color faded much sooner than expected', 'author': 'Person to Person Reviews', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Overall, a comfortable, well-priced and practical shirt. It is comprised of a good weight cotton, well sewn and crafted. Though it has not appeared to shrink, the darker shade of maroon has faded in only a few washings in cold water with gentle detergent. Did not notice until I ordered an additional shirt and when folding the older and newer ones and stacking them to put away, the difference in the depth of color was quite apparent. Obviously, with the lighter shades, this won't be a problem.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars VERY SOFT COTTON - GOOD FIT', 'author': 'jetames', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was very impressed with the quality of this tee shirt. The cotton material is very soft and the color is exactly what I wanted. My only gripe is that the long sleeves are a bit too short. An additional 3/4", or 1 inch in sleeve length would be greatly appreciated. Note that I am of average/normal proportions and I am not overweight. Usually, I purchase Hanes Beefy Tees but I will be trying more of the Amazon Essentials.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not good for tall slim guys', 'author': "J P's Hideaway", 'rating': 3, 'content': "Every time I put this shirt on I tell myself I'm going to go back and write a review so other don't make the same mistake.Pros: Very soft thick cotton. Warm and comfortable Should fit OK for someone a lot shorter than me. Could be a good value for the right person.Cons: Length and sleaves are too short for a tall slim person. First I ordered an X-large based on reviews. The length and sleaves were OK but the body was way too wide and baggy for me, so I gave it away. Then I ordered a large which is what I normally wear. The sleaves and length were too short for me but the body was good. I still wear them but half my forearms show and my stomach often is exposed when sitting. They shrink a lot after washing in cold water. The hem curls up at the bottom which makes it even shorter. I try to correct it, but it won't stay.Then my sister gave me a long sleave T-shirt from REI. The large fit just right! But then it probably cost three times as much as this one.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Beautiful, Heavy-Duty', 'author': 'DJ Salem', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Highly impressed with these gorgeous but simple shirts. Super comfy, thick 100% cotton, very well made, and for the last 25 years I was buying these from LL Bean for twice this price! They weren‚Äôt as posh as these, either . Normally an XL, I took a flyer and chose XXL (based on other recent purchases), and they are just perfect. Love the ecru off-white heather, the heather blue and charcoal; and would order more of the colors but they aren‚Äôt available!On a one to five? These are a six, easy.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good classic regular fit tee long sleeves', 'author': 'Manolo R', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am 5\'8" 180 pounds 35" waist 33 sleeves. Medium fitted very well after washed in cold water, Almost Perfect. Good and soft cotton.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars proportions are wrong: body comfortable/loose, sleeves far too short, plus it shrinks when laundered', 'author': 'carobearo', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'This review is of a Men\'s Medium long sleeve 100% cotton knit shirt that I bought for myself, a woman 5\'8" 140lb athletic build broad shoulders and long arms.I\'ve tried a few of Amazon\'s clothing products, most of which I had to send back because they were so tight. It\'s one thing when they are too big, because I can easily alter them to fit. It\'s harder to expand clothing that is too small. This shirt is BOTH too big and too small.Note: I have laundered it in cold water and machine-dried it on low heat, as the label recommends, but it shrank. I think the sleeves lost at least 2 inches.I will keep this shirt because the material is quite nice: soft stretchy knit cotton that is substantial but not overly heavy, the pattern is very cute (charcoal-colored rough lines like chalk marks on a black background), the sleeves are flexible enough for me to push up to my elbows, and the Too-Big aspect of it means that I can make easy alterations to make this shirt fit me in the body.I fully expected that it might be far too large for me in every way, since I would normally wear a Men\'s Small or Extra-Small, in which case my man would get a surprise new shirt. But I didn\'t expect that the sleeves would be like a 3/4 sleeve for him (6\'3" typically a Men\'s Medium), but that they would be too short by a few inches for me as well.The body is quite long, as expected for a men\'s shirt. My man could wear this length. But I prefer shirts that just skim the top of my jeans. So I will cut off the bottom of the shirt and turn it into sleeve extenders.The body is about the correct width for him, but quite large on me. The yoke is just a long for me as well. The collar fits exactly right on me, so it\'s too small for him. Given all of that, I will either leave the chest and waist loose for a relaxed fit, or I will shape it to give it a more feminine tailoring, while cutting off the five inches that I don\'t need from the bottom and sewing them to the sleeves which definitely do need them!Anyway, if you are a guy with very short arms and too much fat around your middle, or if you always wear your long sleeves pushed up to the elbow anyway, this shirt might work for you off the rack. Everyone else will have to alter the shirt to fit.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt but‚Ä¶.', 'author': 'The Reader', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Love these shirts. I‚Äôve bought several recently and recommend them - with one little caveat.I always buy tees with pockets for my readers. These have really skimpy ones. If I bend over my glasses will fall out every time. Obviously a cost cutting measure. I would have glad paid a few bucks more to get a more generous pocket!Otherwise a great comfy 100% cotton tee!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Sleep', 'author': 'ibready', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Like the material and craftsman ship of the product. It feels very good. The size runs a little small for an XL. Don't know if an XXL would be too big.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Loose Fit Heavyweight Short-Sleeve Pocket T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars The Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Heavyweight Short-Sleeve Pocket T-Shirt", 'author': 'Andrew', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Exceptional Durability: The Carhartt Men\'s Loose Fit Heavyweight T-Shirt is built to last. I\'ve worn mine in tough work environments and it\'s held up incredibly well. The fabric is sturdy and doesn\'t show signs of wear and tear easily.Generous Fit: The "Loose Fit" lives up to its name. It provides ample room for movement, which is crucial for those physically demanding jobs. It doesn\'t constrict, allowing me to work comfortably throughout the day.Handy Pocket: The addition of a chest pocket is a thoughtful touch. It\'s the perfect size for small tools or pens, making it convenient to have essentials at hand.Breathable and Comfortable: Despite its heavyweight fabric, it\'s surprisingly breathable. I\'ve worn it during hot summer days, and it doesn\'t make me overly sweaty. The material is also soft against the skin.Cons:Sizing can be Tricky: While the "Loose Fit" provides room for movement, I found that it runs slightly larger than expected. It might be a good idea to try one size down for a more fitted look.Limited Color Options: Depending on personal preference, some may find the color choices a bit limited. The thick material is great and it's true to size.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pocket Ts', 'author': 'Pegs Toy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts fit well and wash and wear for a long time. They retain their shape and color well. Rugged and great for hard work or an evening out.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite tee!!!', 'author': 'Mind, Soul & Body', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I just got these in the mail and it feels like Christmas! I have been a fan for a while now of the Boulder Creek Big & Tall heavyweight tees. But, due to a variety of factors (cost being one), I have been looking for a replacement. The Carhartt tees are that replacement! They are awesome! While they are not much cheaper, they are a few dollars cheaper, and I\'ll take any bit of savings I can get. Especially because I actually like them better than the Boulder Creek tees so far!Full disclosure, I am female, but I LOVE massively oversized tees. I want the feeling I used to get when as a little girl I used to steal my dad\'s tees. I get that feeling with these. I usually wear a XXL or 2XL Big in men\'s tee\'s. These are larger than any brand (including Boulder Creek) that I\'ve every ordered before. But they are perfect! I have my share of curves, and I hate clinging fabric. These move with me and don\'t cling. A+! The fabric is soft and heavyweight without being stiff. LOVE IT!!!My one "con" is that the sleeves are a little longer than I\'d like. BUT I want the tees to be oversized, and I\'m not wearing these around heavy equipment or machinery, so I don\'t see it being an issue at all. It\'s just something to note, but is barely a "con."Mostly, they will be used for at-home projects, helping people move, lounging, and other activities where I just need a nice comfy tee that will hold up. The worst they\'ll likely face is paint, plaster, sawdust, dust, graphite, charcoal and art supplies. I have no concerns whatsoever about staining or anything. And, PS, great color selection!!!I will 100% be back for more. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt for hiking and the beach', 'author': 'JMS', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Got these shirts for hiking in hawaii, but they were so comfortable I ended up wearing them the entire trip. Large were a bit too big and really long. When I first took them out of the package I thought I was going to be disappointed due to them being see through.
