I gave these shirts 4 stars because the sleeves could be more fitting, they‚Äôre a bit too big and I‚Äôm not a small guy so I could imagine how they would fit on a smaller guy. Overall great product would highly recommend, glad I purchased mine. Haven‚Äôt ran them through my workouts or washed them yet so I can‚Äôt speak on that experience yet.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Reliable - A Wardrobe Essential!', 'author': 'FlyTysun', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Real Essentials 5 Pack of Men's Dry-Fit Moisture Wicking Crew T-Shirts, and they have quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. These shirts are the epitome of comfort and functionality.First and foremost, the comfort level is outstanding. The fabric is soft against the skin, and they fit just right. Whether I'm working out at the gym, going for a run, or simply running errands, these shirts keep me comfortable all day long.The moisture-wicking feature is a game-changer, especially during intense workouts. These shirts do an excellent job of keeping sweat at bay, so I stay dry and fresh even when pushing myself to the limit.I appreciate the attention to detail in the design. The crew neck is just the right depth, and the length of the sleeves is perfect. They provide a flattering fit without being too tight or restrictive.The fact that you get a pack of five shirts at such an affordable price is a fantastic value. It means I always have a fresh one on hand, and they've held up well to repeated washings without losing their shape or color.In summary, the Real Essentials 5 Pack of Men's Dry-Fit Moisture Wicking Crew T-Shirts is a must-have for anyone leading an active lifestyle. They offer unmatched comfort, moisture-wicking capabilities, and a great fit, all at a price that won't break the bank. If you want reliable and comfortable activewear, look no further. These shirts are the real deal - five stars without a doubt!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Sizing', 'author': 'JAMES M JUDD', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Had to order the next larger size as the trim fit was much to tight. I do not like my T shirts to fit that close.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Thin and 1 had a hole in the seam', 'author': 'dvspinay', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Decent shirts. I bought 3 packages and out of all of them, 1 had a hole in sleeve (looks to be a mis-stitch). I have already used up the other shirts making bowling jerseys and didn‚Äôt see the hole until it was too late. I contacted the seller asking to possibly replace just the 1 jersey. Overall, these are ok. Lightweight but thin. Reason for the 3 stars is because of the lack of response from the seller and these rather thin. Maybe the last time I order these. I‚Äôve had dry fit shirts before and they were at least thick enough where it wasn‚Äôt see through but light enough to feel comfortable in.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft material and really fits well', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This product really fits me well I am 6 foot 3 inches and 265 pounds and the XXL 5 pack fits very well however the material seems like it is fragile but for the price I‚Äôm not too concerned about that.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars for the price ... i'm very pleased with these work-out shirts", 'author': 'Shakey Town', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I've been using these t-shirts at the gym for over a week now, and, for the price, I'm more than pleased how they are working out (no pun intended).For right around $7 per shirt (or roughly half the price of the name brand, exercise t-shirts) they are giving me everything I want. The fabric is smooth and easy to wear against my skin. The sweat absorption, especially after doing some time on an elliptical machine, is every bit as good as the name brand. They are light weight enough to not be uncomfortable to wear but at the same time not so lightweight to be 'show through' (I have the darker shades of the t-shirts such as black, blue, red, green etc.).I do recommend that the t-shirts be ordered 1 size larger than normal. I would traditionally wear a size large in t-shirts in order to get a little more 'roomy' type of fit (which i prefer for gym use) but, fortunately, I ordered these t-shirts in an extra large and that extra large size is what i was looking for. Basically, an extra large in these t-shirts is the same as a large in the name brand shirts.I also found that sometimes the looseness/tight-fit of the neck collar is hit-and-miss. On some t-shirts the collar fits fits pretty much the same way that the name brand t-shirts fits but on other t-shirts the collar is larger/looser. In any case, however, none of the t-shirts have a collar that i would consider to be so loose as to unwearable to the gym or even out in public.The length of the t-shirt is good. Both in the arms (which are long enough to cover but not so long to be a problem when weight lifting) and in the length of the bottom of the t-shirt which is long enough so i can easily bend over without any worries.Granted, the overall quality of the t-shirt may not be on-par with the similar brand-name t-shirts, but for half the price these t-shirts are more than close enough to get the job done. And, for the price ($35 for 5-pack), I can recommend trying them.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Sheer undershirt', 'author': 'The Mouse Jockey', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I purchased a set of the white shirts to be used to wear under basketball jerseys for High School practice and games. My son likes how they feel and how they stay loose even while sweating. However, the material is sheer and when he just puts on the white shirt, you can see skin tones through the material. For how these shirts are being used, they were a good value purchase. But since they are sheer, it would be a little odd to wear them in public except as an undershirt.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Shirts, But Size Up!', 'author': 'Kyle E.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I like everything about these shirts for the Arizona summers, but size up ... I\'m 5\'11" and 185 lbs. so I purchased \'Large\' which are rather snug and were replaced by \'X-Large\' which are much more comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000, 2-Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT VALUE', 'author': 'Julian', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt has become a wardrobe staple for me, and its consistent comfort, durability, and versatile design make it a reliable choice for various occasions. This classic tee from Gildan effortlessly combines affordability with quality, creating a go-to option for everyday wear.One of the standout features of the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt is its fabric. The 100% cotton material feels soft against the skin, providing a comfortable and breathable experience throughout the day. The heavyweight cotton adds a sense of durability without compromising on the shirt's overall comfort, making it suitable for year-round wear.The fit of the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt is another notable strength. The shirt offers a generous and relaxed fit without appearing overly baggy. The seamless integration of shoulder-to-shoulder taping enhances the overall structure and ensures that the shirt maintains its shape even after multiple washes. After the first 5 washes (and i always dry my T\'s at the "Low/No Heat" setting) they have shrunk just a bit to make them fit exactly how i like them to fit me. Fits a little loose so i can breathe and move around without the shirt tugging on me. I purchased just a few as "Trial & Error" shirts to see if they were gonna hold up, or of they were gonna end up in my pile of T\'s that would hardly fit my Boston Terrier. They are priced just right and the material is as described, thick and heavy weight. Definitely a keeper, and plan on buying more.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Quality t-shirt!', 'author': 'kailie', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered this for my fianc√© for our engagement shoot and it fit him really well! The fit with extra weight feels good and especailly nice in winter', 'author': 'Jerry L. Griffith', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I\'m actually 42 to 44 chest size but always order XL 46 - 48 rather than perfect fit L because cotton will always shrink. No way around that. When I first put them on they are little large but I expect after one or two washings they will be perfect. I have never bought Beefy T\'s before because I didn\'t know there was such a thing until PT clinic gave me T shirt and I saw Beefy in the label. I had another brand or might been Haines "standard" or standard T Shirt size L and after washed they fit too snug for me. Now if I was muscular with "washboard" abs I might feel different about the tighter fit. I really like the Haines Beefy T. However I would strongly recommend getting a size bigger .', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Light and practical', 'author': 'ronny111', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I use them during my business trips overseas. They are easy to wash in the sink and dry overnight. Very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Would be a good pair of trunks/briefs without very UNCOMFORTABLE sewn-in tags.', 'author': 'End User', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I was a little surprised when I first saw the huge tag in the waistband, but even more surprised to find it is actually 5 full tags sewn together! And this is on the inside of the waistband, against your skin. Plus they\'re sewn in to the waistband very well so you can\'t yank them out without destroying the briefs. I put them on to see how annoying the tags may or may not be, and that\'s when I discovered the other sewn-in tag - it\'s a "Lacoste" branding tag sewn right across the middle of the rear section of the waistband. This smaller tag is actually more noticeable as you\'re wearing the briefs because the stitching results in an abrasive edge, and it sits right on your spine so you feel it anytime you\'re sitting down. And like the other 5 tags, this little needless tag is sewn in to stay, and cannot be ripped out without damage. Most manufacturers have been making underclothing without sewn-in tags for many years, so it\'s amazing that a brand as well known and established as Lacoste is putting out men\'s briefs with not jut tags, but absolute tag overkill. The briefs themselves seem well made and the fit is good, but do yourself a favor and order a men\'s brief without these annoying tags.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars What you see isn‚Äôt what you get', 'author': 'CAprimefan', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Great feel, look and quality but you aren‚Äôt getting what‚Äôs pictured. They clearly show the croc insignia on the front of the boxers and the ones you get are plain.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable, but short', 'author': 'CKE', 'rating': 4, 'content': "They are soft and comfortable to wear, but the length of the whole boxer brief is short, the legs are short, like they are cutting it short to save on fabric. There is a long tag sewn inside, I cut it off. Overall, they are a little too short for my liking and I won't purchase them again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars The gator is missing', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The gator üêä is in the picture on the bottom corner of briefs. But the actually ones I recieved don‚Äôt have the gator. Otherwise good.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's 3-Pack Stretchy Undershirts Crew Neck Long Back Hem T-Shirts
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good Fit, but quality?', 'author': 'Alan J. Hoffman', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The shirts are soft and fit well. title: Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000, 2-Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT VALUE', 'author': 'Julian', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt has become a wardrobe staple for me, and its consistent comfort, durability, and versatile design make it a reliable choice for various occasions. This classic tee from Gildan effortlessly combines affordability with quality, creating a go-to option for everyday wear.One of the standout features of the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt is its fabric. The shirt offers a generous and relaxed fit without appearing overly baggy. The seamless integration of shoulder-to-shoulder taping enhances the overall structure and ensures that the shirt maintains its shape even after multiple washes. The crew neckline and sleeves are designed for comfort and flexibility, adding to the shirt's easy wearability.Durability is a key aspect of the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt. The sturdy construction of the fabric, coupled with double-needle stitching on the sleeves and bottom hem, contributes to the shirt's longevity. I've found that it holds up well to regular washing and maintains its color and shape over time, making it a cost-effective investment in my wardrobe.Versatility is a strong suit of the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt. Whether worn on its own for a casual look or layered under a jacket or hoodie, this tee seamlessly adapts to various styles and occasions. The wide range of available colors ensures that there's a Gildan tee to suit every taste and wardrobe preference.The affordability of the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt makes it an attractive choice for those looking to build a versatile collection of basics without breaking the bank. The quality of the shirt, especially considering its budget-friendly price, positions it as a reliable and accessible option for individuals and organizations alike.The wide availability of sizes ensures that the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt accommodates diverse body types, making it an inclusive choice for a broad range of consumers. The comprehensive size range contributes to the shirt's popularity and accessibility for individuals of all shapes and sizes.In conclusion, the Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt has earned its place as a trusted and timeless wardrobe essential. Its comfort, durability, and affordability make it a reliable choice for everyday wear. Whether you're dressing casually, working out, or customizing for events, the Gildan Heavy Cotton T-Shirt delivers on its promise of comfort and style, making it a reliable and practical addition to any wardrobe.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect T-Shirt for Exceptional Comfort and Versatility!', 'author': 'Shopaholic', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000 Multipack from Amazon, and I couldn't be more thrilled with my purchase. The thickness of the material ensures longevity, making them perfect for daily wear or even as an underlayer during colder months. With just the right amount of room in the shoulders and chest, these shirts provide a flattering look for any body type.One of the aspects that I appreciate the most about these multipacks is the incredible value for money. The Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000, comes in a pack of multiple shirts at an affordable price point. This not only saves me money but also ensures I have a variety of colors to choose from, adding versatility to my wardrobe. From classic neutrals to vibrant shades, there's a color to suit every occasion and personal style.Another standout feature of these shirts is their overall versatility. Whether I'm running errands, working out at the gym, or dressing casually for a social event, these shirts have proven to be an excellent choice. They effortlessly transition from a laid-back style with shorts to a more polished look when paired with jeans or chinos. Their simplicity allows for easy pairing with various accessories or layering options, making them an absolute wardrobe essential.Lastly, the ordering process through Amazon was seamless. The delivery was prompt, and the shirts arrived neatly packaged, ready to be worn. The detailed product description, including size options and color availability, helped me make an informed choice before purchasing.In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend the Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton T-Shirt, Style G5000, Multipack. With remarkable quality, comfortable fit, incredible value for money, and exceptional versatility, these shirts have exceeded my expectations. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars P-E-R-F-E-C-T', 'author': 'Cait', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I cannot tell you how many brands I've tried before 32 degrees. Monson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Have you seen the Fresh Clean Threads and True Classic ads bragging about the slim cut shirts? No shade on them. I love my white Fresh Clean Threads cotton T-Shirt, but it pales in comparison to the 32 Degrees T-Shirts. They are every bit as form fitting and slimming, but are also made of very thin, dry fit, material that is incredibly comfortable even on hot days. They are not cotton, so those other shirts may be better, if that is what you are looking for. I also had a white 32 Degrees T-Shirt that I thought was a little too thin and almost see through, but that is not a problem with the other colors.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, comfy and very light but way too thin for my liking.', 'author': 'A', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I have yet to use it for the gym but from trying it on for a while and inspecting it I would say it is pretty good for the price. The t-shirt is very light, fits well and it is comfy.I got the black one and I don't think it is see through when you are wearing it. You can certainly hold up to the sun or look through it with a light but it will not be see through when you are wearing it.It feels like it will stretch well without ripping while exercising and being so thin should also help dry faster. However, as I mentioned, it is way too thin for my liking and to the point I might forget I am even wearing it. If you don't mind this, I think it is a very solid deal for the price but you can find other options at $20 that will probably feel much better.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic t shirts!', 'author': 'M. Hiller', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Super comfortable, well made, very breathable and perfect fit for me. These are much more comfortable than a cotton t shirt, especially when worn under dress shirts. Highly recommend!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer', 'author': 'onehart10', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have purchased several moisture wicking shirts because I wear a ballistic vest as a law enforcement officer. I have several moisture wicking shirts from Nike, Under Armour, and lesser known brands. I was in Costco when I saw the 32 Degrees underwear and decided to try them. I was not disapponited and decided to give the 32 Degrees shirts a try and again I am not disappointed. The shirts are good quality, soft, and as advertised made me feel cool like better known brands. However, none of the well known brands can compete with the 32 Degrees price and I hope they will stay at this price without reducing the quality of the product. My opinion is the 32 Degrees shirt is a comparable brand to Nike and Under Arnour, but if price is a factor without losing quality then 32 Degrees products are the better brand. I have recently purchased the long sleeve shirts and remain a satisfied and now loyal customer of 32 Degrees. Stay cool everyone. If you are wondering I am wearing the shirts in the hot, humid, Southeast Summer heat under my ballistic vest. Game changer!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 12, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!', 'author': 'Very good material,  would definitely purchase more!', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The material is very good and soft.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable', 'author': 'Edward F. Moherek', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Fits perfectly', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The product fit comfortably and was perfect for the gym', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Works at keeping you cool', 'author': 'Mark Holm', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was doubtful that a special fabric tee shirt could help keep one cooler in the summer - I live in a area that common temperatures during the day in the summer range between 95 to 105. Yes this Tshirt does do the job of helping to keep you cool much more than a regular cotton tshirt. Now it isn‚Äôt the same as having a good A/C unit in the summer but it does do a great job of helping to keep you cooler when outside in the heat. I liked it so much I wanted to buy a few more but Amazon never got it back in stock during the summer. It does help and I am happy with the purchase.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

I‚Äôve had into the AM shirts for close to 3 years and they‚Äôve fit me as well as they did on day one and aged very well with minimal fade.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good shirt, bad stitching', 'author': 'Chris', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'UPDATE: After this review, I was contacted and asked if I would like a refund of my order. The replacement has no defect.I increased the rating from 3 stars to 4 stars for excellent customer service and standing behind the product.Original review:This shirt fits well; tight fit in the upper body (chest, shoulders, arms) and looser in the waist.However, the stitching at the armpit was poorly done and there was an opening just under the left armpit.I was going to return it but my wife liked how the shirt fit me and she wanted me to wear it so she just sewed it up.These are well-designed but poorly made and not worth the price, in my opinion.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Solid material, varying sizes', 'author': 'Max Rodgers', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These t-shirts are incredibly comfy and I love all of the colors that the variety pack came with. The quality of the material feels really nice; however, I have noticed a few stitches coming out of place after about 4-months of wearing these. I'd like to see the consistency of these shirts be a bit higher to really give them 5-stars, but compared to my other t-shirts I think the quality is definitely there.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great Shirts!', 'author': 'Q', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love these shirts. title: Men's Heavyweight Cotton Short Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A Wardrobe Must-Have!', 'author': 'Ricardo Ramirez', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I can't say enough good things about the Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Cotton Short Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt! This shirt is an absolute gem. It's not your run-of-the-mill tee; it's heavyweight cotton that feels incredibly soft yet sturdy, so it stands up to daily wear and countless washes without losing its shape or color. The fit is spot on, and the crew neck design is timeless. I've stocked up on several colors, and they've become my daily go-to shirts. Whether I'm dressing up or keeping it casual, this tee never lets me down. If you're on the hunt for a high-quality, comfortable, and stylish shirt that won't break the bank, do yourself a favor and grab a few of these ‚Äì you won't regret it!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Tired of not getting the "T" in your XL"T" t-shirts? The "T" is here', 'author': 'double thick', 'rating': 5, 'content': "After reading all the reviews I was still a little hesitant - well being one of the big boys it sucks trying to find shirts that don't fit properly in the length. These have perfect length - absolutely love this shirt. Bought just the one to see how it would fit, now I will be buying several more in the variety of colors that are offered.So, as I mentioned the LENGTH is pretty much perfect (yes there is some ambiguity to that and what is perfect for me may be too short/long for others). The best way to describe the length is: (1) it's NOT so long that you will be confused as a chulo or brother with the t-shirts that could be a dress. (2) It IS long enough that you do not try to figure out if it is actually a TALL or notThe THICKNESS of the material comes into question. If I were to consider myself a t-shirt guru (and I actually do) the thickness of these shirts is somewhat exaggerated. Having read the other reviews before buying I expected the shirts to be really thick and heavy. The reality is that they are a high-quality t-shirt. (high-quality t-shirt . . . is that an oxymoron?)No, it is not an under shirt; similar to the 3 pack white FOTL or Hanes. Therefore, why would you expect it to feel like one. Quite honestly, the thickness reminds me of Nautica t-shirts (of which I paid $55 for one stinking t-shirt). Long story short --> this t-shirt is thicker than a plain white under tee but is by no means any thicker than a higher quality t-shirtNow to the NECK - it is a bit snug. This shirt has become my most snug as far as neck opening goes.Hers' the problem with this - how do you subjectively explain the fit/feel? I happen to like a tighter neck (coming from someone who HATES V-neck shirts - so you know I like the neck area a little tighter than most) but this shirt does make me give the neck opening a little pull/stretch every so often. BUT, if you remember the beginning of my review I wrote that I will be buying more of the shirts. So, the snugness of the neck is not so much of a deterrent that it will stop me from buying more.I can say this, if you do not like the neck opening to be snug then you really should consider not buying this brand of shirt.All-in-all I am very pleased with the purchase of this ProClub shirt. The length is perfect and the 2XL part fits well too. The pricing of the shirts - $9.99 to $13.99 is a great price for these quality shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Thick Undershirt', 'author': 'Whatev', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The first thing that impressed me about this t-shirt is the quality of the material. The thickness of the fabric not only gives it a luxurious feel but also ensures durability. The cotton used is soft against the skin, providing comfort throughout the day. I'm not a fan of drapey or thin t-shirts that hug in all the wrong places. This shirt is the opposite of that.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent shirt! ‚Ä¶but it didn‚Äôt fit me well.', 'author': 'BBAZ', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Thick, heavy fabrics - well made. Good fit, soft and comfy!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cheap', 'author': 'Steven K', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These are comfy, inexpensive, and hold up through lots of wear and washings.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit, material only OK', 'author': 'LongWheelbase', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Pros: low price, flattering fitCons: material pills over time and doesn't drape symmetricallyConclusion: worth the price anyway", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars A Journey from Land's End to Next Level", 'author': 'LXLS', 'rating': 5, 'content': "In the dynamic landscape of t-shirt brands, it's a tall order to find one that consistently maintains its quality amidst redesigns. My loyalty has traditionally been with Land's End for their supima cotton tees, which strike an excellent balance between material comfort and price, despite their limited color selection and availability. My journey for a wider color range led me through an extensive list of brands, exploring supima cotton, 100% cotton, and wool/cotton blends. Next Level emerged as a standout due to its affordability, durability through countless washes without compromised stitching, and a broad color palette with comfortable crew fits. For those prioritizing value, Next Level offers compelling 100% cotton options. While I'll continue to turn to Land's End for supima cotton traditional shades, Next Level aptly fills this gap. I encountered issues with Hanes' stitching durability and Gildan's inconsistent stitching patterns. Although Bombas and Smartwool offer quality wool t-shirts, my preference leans towards cotton for its ease of care, reserving wool for premium long underwear due to its higher maintenance.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Update!!! First impression as good as Grunt style with out the logo!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Just received this tshirt. It fits great! Fits exactly like my Grunt-style t-shirts! Hopefully it washes without shrinking! I will update after washing it.! *Update* It washed great and fits great! Definitely recommend!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite shirts', 'author': 'Tony Pepperoni', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Next level shirts are a perfect fit if you have an athletic build.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Shrinks in wash', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Love the shirts great colors and fit perfect before the wash now it‚Äôs a bit snug and shorter making it difficult to conceal carry. I would order a size up', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars My have ordered the wrong style', 'author': 'Jon McKerry', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I like Next Level shirts. Usually they're always soft and fit well. I may have ordered the wrong style and maybe should've check my previous shirt's 'model number'. This shirt felt cheap, thin and itchy.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft', 'author': 'NoPublicName', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Soft', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Short Sleeve Pocket T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Best $10 Work Shirts I've Owned", 'author': 'Michael Stokes', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These shirts are overall fantastic. The fit is very lose, so you may want to size down if you don't plan on wearing these shirts on their own, but the longer fit is very nice for when you're reaching above your head.If you're looking for a more form fitting cotton tee, this isn't for you. These run large, and they're relaxed fit. That makes for a slightly baggy, but more substantial work shirt.My favorite part of these shirts is the material. It's 7oz cotton so it's thicker and feels smoother to the touch than most t-shirts (which range from 4-6oz typically). The stitching looks great for the price and the thicker material makes the pocket more usable for slightly heavier items, where other shirts will have a droopy pocket as soon as you throw a pen and a flashlight in there.There's hundreds of great brands that sell T-Shirts from $8-$15, but these seem like a great choice. I bought 2 of them, and like them enough that I'll be purchasing a couple more.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirts', 'author': 'Mr. Mechanical', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I work in a lot of oil and fluids. title: Men's Venice Burnout Notch Neck Tee Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Ok, honest review here. Also, 1 star reviews aren‚Äôt lying as well.', 'author': 'Samuel Mathews', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I‚Äôll start with the cons. After a few washes, the shirts pile up. (Tiny little cotton balls that pile up everywhere on the shirt) the colors do indeed fade, but who cares, it still looks good. I hardly ever gotten compliments on shirts but I did with these shirts but I didn‚Äôt get the shirts for that reason. They are very comfortable and have a great fit. Especially if you‚Äôre in the slightly athletic and up, build. Nice fit on the biceps. But not too tight, nice fit around the chest. It even accentuates your back quite well too. Look, they shirts are 20 bucks. Buy a couple colors you like, if you like them a lot, but one or two more of that same color and put them away for when they stop selling these shirts. They are worth the cons that everyone talks about.To make them last longer and keep their size. Never dry them using any heat, not even the delicate setting. I hang dry all of mine. I think air fluff dryer setting would work fine. Machine wash gentle. Even as they fade or ‚Äúpile‚Äù up, they are still a much better looking shirt than any logo or solid color tee. Buy one! You‚Äôll love it.True to size. Good length. I‚Äôm 6‚Äô4‚Äù 210, about a 40cm bicep. Sleeves are slightly snug on my arms for a nice look.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This shirt fits like a glove and is super soft to thr touch!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Comfort-Great Style', 'author': 'Edgewater House', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Style is very attractive. Texture is soft and comfortable. I purchased this as a gift for a grandson. He loves it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome', 'author': 'Barbara Thompson', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Color was great.. soft material. Love the fit... gives you extra room.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Great, fashionable and affordable. Beats other mens' t-shirts, hands-down!", 'author': 'Rick Shaw', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shirts are a great alternative to men\'s T-shirts. They are stylish and come in many colors (I own about 12 different colors). The ONLY thing to know about them is that they wear out quickly (like 2 seasons). I wear mine a lot (7 months out of the year they are my main t-shirt), so they get washed a lot and quickly take on the faded (burn-out) look. It\'s a nice look up to a point, and then the shirts just look threadbare. But at $20-35 per shirt (depending on when I buy them) they are still a great deal if they last only 2 years. The fabrics vary from color to color, even though you\'d think they are all made of the same stuff. For instance, the "white" color clearly has more cotton in the blend and will last longer. Some colors, seemingly randomly, last longer than others. But again, they ALL look great when new and I get compliments on them all the time. Several of my male friends have pretty much abandoned their old t-shirts in favor of a collection of the Venice Burn-out shirts. I sure I\'ll be buying more of them!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt, I cam e back and bought 4 more.', 'author': 'S. Harper', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The cut of these shirts makes it look like I bought them on purpose, for the fit. Which I did. I bought one, loved the way it fit, and went back to buy 4 more in different colors. Great purchase.I\'m 6\'1, 215 with what clothing companies would call an "Athletic build," Meaning I\'m a big guy with broad shoulders, but not significantly overweight (maybe 10 pounds over, which for my body type isn\'t very much.) Most T-shirts for around $20 don\'t fit me very well. XL is usually too big, hanging like curtains below my shoulders. And L is generally right on the edge for me. If I\'m 10 pounds over my normal, as I am right now (and likely will be for the foreseeable future), a size Large will be too tight across my chest.The wrong fit can really make me look bad by adding perceived weight, while the right fit usually brings a lot of "Hey, did you lose weight?" questions.These shirts, in an XL are perfect for me. Big enough to fit my shoulders, tapering a little bit in across my \'not bad\' torso. Well worth the extra money. Love them.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft', 'author': 'Miss Angela', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I got this for my son for Christmas because he needed more shirts. This looked just like a regular tee shirt but it's so much softer! It's very good quality and he looks great in it and loves it!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable', 'author': 'sasquatch poacher', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This shirt is as pictured fits well and is very soft.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!', 'author': 'Johnny', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Absolutely love this shirt. Bought 3 more!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Swag', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love them , great fit wear them everyday almost!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

However I would strongly recommend getting a size bigger .', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Light and practical', 'author': 'ronny111', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I use them during my business trips overseas. They are easy to wash in the sink and dry overnight. Very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Would be a good pair of trunks/briefs without very UNCOMFORTABLE sewn-in tags.', 'author': 'End User', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I was a little surprised when I first saw the huge tag in the waistband, but even more surprised to find it is actually 5 full tags sewn together! And this is on the inside of the waistband, against your skin. Plus they\'re sewn in to the waistband very well so you can\'t yank them out without destroying the briefs. I put them on to see how annoying the tags may or may not be, and that\'s when I discovered the other sewn-in tag - it\'s a "Lacoste" branding tag sewn right across the middle of the rear section of the waistband. This smaller tag is actually more noticeable as you\'re wearing the briefs because the stitching results in an abrasive edge, and it sits right on your spine so you feel it anytime you\'re sitting down. And like the other 5 tags, this little needless tag is sewn in to stay, and cannot be ripped out without damage. Most manufacturers have been making underclothing without sewn-in tags for many years, so it\'s amazing that a brand as well known and established as Lacoste is putting out men\'s briefs with not jut tags, but absolute tag overkill. The briefs themselves seem well made and the fit is good, but do yourself a favor and order a men\'s brief without these annoying tags.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars What you see isn‚Äôt what you get', 'author': 'CAprimefan', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Great feel, look and quality but you aren‚Äôt getting what‚Äôs pictured. They clearly show the croc insignia on the front of the boxers and the ones you get are plain.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable, but short', 'author': 'CKE', 'rating': 4, 'content': "They are soft and comfortable to wear, but the length of the whole boxer brief is short, the legs are short, like they are cutting it short to save on fabric. There is a long tag sewn inside, I cut it off. Overall, they are a little too short for my liking and I won't purchase them again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars The gator is missing', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The gator üêä is in the picture on the bottom corner of briefs. But the actually ones I recieved don‚Äôt have the gator. Otherwise good.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Heavyweight Cotton Short Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A Wardrobe Must-Have!', 'author': 'Ricardo Ramirez', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I can't say enough good things about the Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Cotton Short Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt! This shirt is an absolute gem. It's not your run-of-the-mill tee; it's heavyweight cotton that feels incredibly soft yet sturdy, so it stands up to daily wear and countless washes without losing its shape or color. The fit is spot on, and the crew neck design is timeless. I've stocked up on several colors, and they've become my daily go-to shirts. Whether I'm dressing up or keeping it casual, this tee never lets me down. If you're on the hunt for a high-quality, comfortable, and stylish shirt that won't break the bank, do yourself a favor and grab a few of these ‚Äì you won't regret it!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Tired of not getting the "T" in your XL"T" t-shirts? The "T" is here', 'author': 'double thick', 'rating': 5, 'content': "After reading all the reviews I was still a little hesitant - well being one of the big boys it sucks trying to find shirts that don't fit properly in the length. These have perfect length - absolutely love this shirt. Bought just the one to see how it would fit, now I will be buying several more in the variety of colors that are offered.So, as I mentioned the LENGTH is pretty much perfect (yes there is some ambiguity to that and what is perfect for me may be too short/long for others). The best way to describe the length is: (1) it's NOT so long that you will be confused as a chulo or brother with the t-shirts that could be a dress. (2) It IS long enough that you do not try to figure out if it is actually a TALL or notThe THICKNESS of the material comes into question. If I were to consider myself a t-shirt guru (and I actually do) the thickness of these shirts is somewhat exaggerated. Having read the other reviews before buying I expected the shirts to be really thick and heavy. The reality is that they are a high-quality t-shirt. (high-quality t-shirt . . . is that an oxymoron?)No, it is not an under shirt; similar to the 3 pack white FOTL or Hanes. Therefore, why would you expect it to feel like one. Quite honestly, the thickness reminds me of Nautica t-shirts (of which I paid $55 for one stinking t-shirt). Long story short --> this t-shirt is thicker than a plain white under tee but is by no means any thicker than a higher quality t-shirtNow to the NECK - it is a bit snug. This shirt has become my most snug as far as neck opening goes.Hers' the problem with this - how do you subjectively explain the fit/feel? I happen to like a tighter neck (coming from someone who HATES V-neck shirts - so you know I like the neck area a little tighter than most) but this shirt does make me give the neck opening a little pull/stretch every so often. BUT, if you remember the beginning of my review I wrote that I will be buying more of the shirts. So, the snugness of the neck is not so much of a deterrent that it will stop me from buying more.I can say this, if you do not like the neck opening to be snug then you really should consider not buying this brand of shirt.All-in-all I am very pleased with the purchase of this ProClub shirt. The length is perfect and the 2XL part fits well too. The pricing of the shirts - $9.99 to $13.99 is a great price for these quality shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Thick Undershirt', 'author': 'Whatev', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The first thing that impressed me about this t-shirt is the quality of the material. The thickness of the fabric not only gives it a luxurious feel but also ensures durability. The cotton used is soft against the skin, providing comfort throughout the day. I'm not a fan of drapey or thin t-shirts that hug in all the wrong places. This shirt is the opposite of that.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent shirt! ‚Ä¶but it didn‚Äôt fit me well.', 'author': 'BBAZ', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Thick, heavy fabrics - well made. title: X-Temp Performance T-Shirt Pack, Cotton Blend Moisture-Wicking Tees for Men, 2-Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice undershirt', 'author': 'Jamie D.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I‚Äôve had mixed experiences with these shirts. The navy ones were a little shorter and not as soft. They shrunk more than the grey ones. The grey shirts are great. Fit just like I wanted, are soft, and didn‚Äôt shrink in the wash. I imaging the dying process is different between the navy and grey shirts, which is the issue.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Comfort and Moisture-Wicking', 'author': 'Real Deal', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The X-Temp technology in these t-shirts is a game-changer. It actively adapts to my body temperature, keeping me cool and comfortable even during intense physical activities. The moisture-wicking feature works like a charm, ensuring that sweat is quickly drawn away from my skin, leaving me feeling fresh and dry throughout the day.The cotton blend fabric of these t-shirts strikes the perfect balance between softness and durability. The shirts feel incredibly comfortable against my skin, and they have a nice stretch that allows for easy movement. I appreciate the quality stitching, which gives the t-shirts a solid construction that can withstand frequent wear and washing without losing shape.The fit is just right for me, with a relaxed yet flattering silhouette. The length is perfect, and the sleeves are neither too tight nor too loose. The two-pack offers great value, providing me with two reliable shirts that I can wear for various occasions.I also appreciate the versatility of these t-shirts. They can be easily dressed up or down, making them suitable for casual outings, workouts, or even as an undershirt for layering. The classic design and solid colors make them easy to pair with any outfit.All in all, I highly recommend these shirts to anyone in need of comfortable, moisture-wicking, and durable t-shirts. They offer excellent performance and value, making them a wardrobe staple for men seeking ultimate comfort and style.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Too short for me', 'author': 'PaulInIL', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I am 6\'2" and right at that point where talls are not always needed, while normal length is just barely long enough. It makes ordering things difficult because often talls are not available and regular 3x could go either way. I had ordered two of these in the heather gray color and they were just long enough and I really liked them. I ordered two more in black and they were just a hair too short. No one wants to see an old man\'s belly button. If they had been more consistent, I would rate them higher as they are nice and soft, and the collars are well made and reasonably sized. Some shirts in 3x end up with a neck opening that is just huge and looks stretched out. These are well proportioned other than being too short.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent T-shirts true to size fit Very comfortable', 'author': 'nightmagic86', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Bought the two pack of charcoal Gray, These are Excellent T-shirts they are true to size fit. They are not to tight but not baggy Very comfortable. The Stitching is good and they wash up really well. Would highly recommend. Thinking on ordering a few more in different colors.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great T-shirt for Hot Weather... Breathes Well...', 'author': 'Randall Riley', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Purchased two of these recently, looking for a lightweight T-shirt that I could wear around the house during this awful heatwave we're having in the South in summer 2023. I wasn't sure if they'd be both cool and durable, standing up to repeated wearing and washing. So far, they've accomplished both.KUDOS: Well made and not shrinking or changing shape in the wash/dry cycles. Color is holding true after many wash/wear cycles. In terms of their being lightweight enough to stay cool/wick moisture during this heatwave, they are excellent and I find that on hotter days, I find myself looking specifically for them in the closet to put on, choosing them over many others that are good but just a little too thick for a hot day. Cloth does a great job of wicking moisture and keeping you comfy. NOTE: If you're reading this in winter and are looking for something that's short sleeve but a tad warmer, these aren't your go-to because you'll be too cool... you'll want something thicker for that season.CONS: none thus far but if I find they don't hold up all summer, I'll be back to update this review.In short, I enjoy these T-shirts enough that I went back and bought two more of them and think you'll enjoy them, too. I recommend these for sure.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Fits just like snug medium. They might be B stock shirts or something, i like them tho.', 'author': 'daniel  caldwell', 'rating': 3, 'content': "These seem like very nice shirts I would say they fit like a snug medium more like a fitted shift which is nice, might be b stock items or something tho, i got black and see some of them are stitched with grey thread on some parts of the shirt and black on others. the one i have on now the length of the shirt is longer on one side than the other plus some other weird flaws. but i guess i wont complain too much, still nice shirts.I actually thought X temp shirts were the one hundred percent polyester shirts not a mix of polyester and cotton,. Somehow in the description which it states clearly I miss that and I saw some idiots in the questions that gave an answer saying that these were the ones that were 100% polyester and that the cool dry shirts war the blend. Well it turns out it's the exact oppositebut I was looking at these and the cool dry shirts and I can't remember if the idiot was answering the questions on this item or the other item but either way I'm a big stupid idiot for listening to that idiots and not reading the description thoroughly.. but he clearly said the x-temp shirts are designed to keep your cool NR 100% polyester which is not the case. I love the under armour style shirts which are 100% polyester I just hate how the shoulder seam is like Cutler instead of on top of the shoulder on those under armour shirts so I wanted to get a different brand,. that's what I was trying to get here,. something similar to an under armour shirt but this feels like regular cotton for the most partThe good news is I could use a couple regular black t-shirts anyways so I guess I won't get too upset. Next time I know which one is the order if I want a hundred percent polyester,I just can't believe I missed that in the description and went by what some random person said ‚òπÔ∏è", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 6, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable !', 'author': 'Zachary Rappo', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I absolutely love these Hanes x-temps. They are so comfortable and extremely breathable, they are never scratchy on your skin and long lasting comfort all day long.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt/material, terrible quality control and sleeve length', 'author': 'Vince', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I\'m 5\' 7", athletic build, wide back/shoulders. The medium fit fine, as a large would be too baggy around the torso area, and the neck hole would also be too large. Medium fit good and snug. The material is toward the thin side, but not a bad thin. It\'s perfect for working out in and keeps me feeling dry and good. I washed the shirts and there wasn\'t any shrinkage, as it\'s a blend of cotton/polyester.The issue with this shirt is that the short sleeve length is WAY to short. The quality is also very inconsistent in the shirts. My arm\'s aren\'t boulders either. Just athletic with a little more muscle on. So the size of my arms isn\'t making the sleeves ride up.I purchased a pack of white, black and grey. I so far have the white and black. The white shirts have a larger neck hole than the black. The white shirt sleeves go mid-bicep on my arm. The black shirt fits much smaller. The sleeve length is about a half inch to an inch shorter than the white. New update on the steel grey, these are even smaller than the black shirts. These will remain an undershirt, as it looks like a women\'s shirt with how short the sleeves are.This now makes the black shirt sleeve length sitting ABOVE mid bicep, making it look like i have a tight fitting shirt on with super short sleeves.. Just raising my arm a little makes the sleeves ride up more - this is terrible for the gym and in general. The white was more giving, but the black was not.I put the white/black on top of each other, and it\'s very noticeable on the shortened sleeves on the black..These shirts are great other than their quality control, and the inconsistency in the colors/sizes, when ordering the same size. Two colors, both mediums, fitting very different.I know these are priced low, but come on, have some quality control on the product. The black ones will now either become sleeveless shirts for the gym or i\'ll just wear them as a strict undershirt.I will not be buying this product anymore. I wanted to order many of the colors and multiple quantities so I wouldn\'t have to worry about not having a color to wear if it were dirty. I will be looking at other options with sleeve lengths that will be at least mid bicep, or an inch or two past mid bicep. I don\'t need to wear these shirts that make me look like I got it from Baby Gap, when it\'s an Adult Medium..Steel grey medium is smaller yet, as I stated earlier, but leaving this update at the end. I would avoid these shirts unless you\'re a small slim person. If you have ANY muscle, or any athleticism to your body type, stay away.5/29/2017 UPDATE: Decided to give it another chance. I got red and blue, and the blue sleeves are much shorter than the red. Also, one black shirt I previously bought started having loose threads on the bottom, so that shirt is now garbage. The other shirts held up.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This fit perfectly', 'author': 'Amy M Fries', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Hubby was looking for a nicer undershirt to wear under his Hawaiian and Cuban shirt, and if he gets hot he can take off the top shirt and still look nice, this fit the bill. It works both under his nicer button down and as a normal shirt, sizing was perfect, it fit just right', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Hanes X-Temp 2pack of Black Medium T-Shirts Received 04/06/2023', 'author': 'MCS', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'These appear to be decent t-shirts for less than $6 each. Here are some details I‚Äôd like to share with other potential buyers: The shirts I received have sewn-in tags, not screen printed labeling. The tags and packaging do not have any washing instructions. Packaging is not Hanes retail logo packaging. The fit appears to be like an outerwear t shirt, not a form fitting underwear t-shirt. I purchased size medium, I have a 40R chest measurement and wear men‚Äôs size medium in most shirts. If the t-shirts do not shrink I think I can wear them alone as an outerwear t-shirt or under another shirt without any issues. The fit seems to be not too tight and not too loose. Not a baggy fit and not a form fitting underwear t-shirt fit. The length seems long enough to tuck in pants, but not as long as underwear shirts with longer length. Sleeve length is not as long as outerwear t-shirts used to be, but also not as short as many modern shirts which have very short short sleeves. Given the packaging, tags, and lack of laundering instructions, I do question if these are indeed actually Hanes shirts or if they may be counterfeit(?). The fabric looks decent, but some of the sewing work looks less than top quality. I will wash and wear them and hope that they do not fall apart or show defects. I hope this information and thoughts are helpful to others.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars As described', 'author': 'Pepito Honguito', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Cotton t shirts very soft and comfortable. Simple and stylish. Just perfect.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and just the right size', 'author': 'MMN', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I would order from this seller again!üòÅGreat quality and just the right size. I also loved that it got here pretty quick!üëç', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars T shirt', 'author': 'Great choice I‚Äôm happy with the purchase', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Perfect for the price!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, but small after wash', 'author': 'Mr. Mechanic', 'rating': 4, 'content': "The black shirts I bought were in fact 100% cotton. I knew there would be some shrinkage because I am not going to cold water hand wash my shirts and not dry them in a heated dryer. None the less, I buy and use a lot of tee shirts and these shrank more then other brands I have bought.The shrinkage is not so bad that I can't wear them, but the cut of the shirts, in particular the short sleeves, are very short. I am average build and arms with bigger shoulders and the sleeves end about 2 inches up from elbows. So if you like short short sleeves, then this cut might be for you. But they are not traditional, as all other Tee Shirts on me end right about the elbow/bend in my arm. I fear how they will look with a few more washes.If you are someone who cold washes and hang dries or cold dries your Tee Shirts, this is not a big issue. I don't have time or patience. The cut is still a bit odd, but overall they are very nice thick cotton and good material.In comparison, I bought some Amazon Essential 100% cotton Tees for about the same price at the same time and although the material is ever so slightly thinner, I really like the cut/sleeves and the fit for a more muscular guy like me and they fit perfect. It is all about preference and everyone has a different body, so it is just my opinion.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 16, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Gildan is the best brand', 'author': 'Kristen', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love Gildan shirts . reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Cool and Comfortable: Fruit of the Loom Men's Active Undershirts!", 'author': 'Mark Forrester', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Experience unbeatable comfort and performance with Fruit of the Loom Men's Lightweight Active Cotton Blend Undershirts! title: Men's Eversoft Cotton Sleeveless T Shirts, Breathable & Moisture Wicking with Odor Control, Sizes S-4x
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Muscle shirt.', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm 6ft 170lbs (medium sized shirt)I'm thin and long and I find it difficult to find any sort of muscle shirt (actually, any sort oft-shirt ) that fits me perfectly. Usually muscle shirts fit me like a dress or have enormous arm holes or fit great then shrink up to baby sized after one wash. These fruit of the loom shirts are the best out there. I've tried them all. These are well made. They're tailored. They hold up wash after wash. They feel great and look perfect. I never question this shirt once I've put it on. Can't say it enough; this is the best muscle shirt out there. I hope they never stop making it...and maybe add a few other colors??If you struggle to find a muscle shirt that you feel comfortable and confident in, this is totally the shirt for you.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Muscle Shirt', 'author': 'L. Kozak', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Very happy with the purchase of these shirts. Fit is excellent. Material is soft and it's moisture wicking, too. This will be an excellent shirt to go under a Hawaiian or any other shirt. Has that classy look, too. Black is very black and hope that it will hold it's color for awhile. Length is just right. Definitely recommend these shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good shirts', 'author': 'Hannah', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Good for wearing around the house or for exercise. Came with an odd smell, however. Fit just right.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Shirt But Not Thick Cotton', 'author': 'Philip Marland', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This is a good loose fitting muscle shirt with a nice cotton feel. I did not sense the severe toxic odors that was mentioned in a review and that I've experienced with various cotton shirts over the last few years. All of the name brands such as Champion etc have changed country of manufacture often enough which would affect fabric dye choice and other chemicals used in sourced cotton, manufacture and shipping concerns.. The best you can do is purchase one of something to see if the dye and other added chemicals bothers you. This shirt is light weight cotton. Feels nice. Very nice fit. The last ten years I've noticed no shirt company has that pure scent of clean cotton anymore. In the new times of outsourced materials and manufacturing the clean smelling cotton shirts I used to purchase might be gone forever. I used to get these at Walmart but lately I don't see them as they have been replaced by lighter weight synthetic fabrics.So this might work for you. But it does have a slight chemical scent that I'm trying to ignore while I use a milled natural Orange Blossom laundry soap on them.So I'll give this shirt four stars.The laundry soap I use is powdered made by the Temecula Olive Oil Company. Smells nice. Amazon might sell it or something similar.Hope this helps someone out there.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and fits great', 'author': 'Carter', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Size was true and theyre great for yard work, very soft', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and price', 'author': 'Abelardo C.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Excellent shirts to go to the gym at unbeatable price', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit', 'author': 'Chris', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Normally I don't buy shirts off Amazon, but needed some shirts to wear around the house. These shirts are super comfortable and fit great. I have since bought them in other colors as well.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Lightweight', 'author': 'iHaveaProblem', 'rating': 3, 'content': "TL;DR:The Fruit of the Loom Men's Eversoft Cotton Sleeveless T-Shirts provide comfort and lightweight wear for casual occasions. Made with soft Eversoft cotton material, they are suitable for warm weather. The sleeveless design offers freedom of movement. These shirts are affordable and widely available, but their durability may not be as high as some higher-end options. Color and style choices are limited, and sizing can be inconsistent.Pros:- Soft and comfortable Eversoft cotton material- Lightweight and breathable for warm weather- Sleeveless design allows freedom of movement- Affordable and widely availableCons:- Durability may not be as high as some higher-end options- Limited color and style options- Sizing can be inconsistentSummary:The Fruit of the Loom Men's Eversoft Cotton Sleeveless T-Shirts offer a comfortable and lightweight option for casual wear. reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, good fit. I'm impressed.", 'author': 'boingo of the oing', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These t-shirts are as basic as you can get and for me they\'re just right. At 6\'2" ~215 lbs, and over 50, my physique may no longer be Greek, but I don\'t have a massive belly or moobs (much) either. The XL size lets me move unrestricted without feeling like I\'m wearing a mu-mu. title: Unisex Tie Dye T-Shirts for Adults
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Cute shirt', 'author': 'AGCreeds', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I bought this to be part of a 70's themed costume but will wear it this summer with shorts and jeans! Good fit, good quality material. The colors are vibrant and as advertised.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars NICE MATERIAL AND SO COLORFUL!!', 'author': 'CHERYL', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Started purchasing and wearing tie-dye tees during Covid and am keeping it up! Just love them!! This seller has several colors and styles, plus sizes for all!! This tee is so pretty and love the bright colors. Did not fade in the wash!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Spectacular Shirts, mostly?.....', 'author': 'Mark E.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Edit: Jan. 2022: I ordered all XL shirts and I am 6\'1" 185 lbs. slim and the shirts are only a little loose. They are perfect like this for me. I think the Large would have been too snug for my taste. After one year they have softened up a little. Good quality. Colors haven\'t changed and the shirt itself is in the same condition.2020: I ordered a bunch of these shirts and still have a few more to receive. Some of them look amazing. They are beautiful. Others don\'t match the picture and their lines are blurred and it makes all the difference. I think if you see one that you really like and you receive one that is disappointing, you can order another one of the same shirt to see if it\'s better, if not send them back.Here are the ones that look awesome in my opinion: Coral Reef(My favorite), Camo Swirl, Barbados, Blue Ocean. The ones that just didn\'t do it for me were: Karma and Kaleidoscope.( They looked great in the photos, but not so much in real life.) I\'m still waiting and hoping for Earth(update: Earth looks awesome!) and St. Lucia.(St. Lucia arrived, but didn\'t look like the photo and it just doesn\'t look good. In my opinion all of the ones with the Caribbean island names look great.They don\'t have Antigua in my size. I would like to get Antigua. Trinidad is a bit bright for me.If you are like me and sometimes you wear an XL and other times an L, I\'d go for the XL with these. They don\'t really shrink, but I guess it depends how loose or tight you like your shirts. It would also be good to wash it the first few times separate from clothing that could be affected by the colors running and to use some fabric softener. These are comfortable but they aren\'t super soft at first. They will take a few washes and wearing them to break them in.Overall I love these shirts and I wish they would keep coming up with different color combinations. I have mostly solid color shorts, so it\'s easy to match these with your shorts. There is bound to be a color in the shirt that matches with the shorts. If that\'s important to you.Most importantly if and when you spill some food or drink on your shirt, hopefully it won\'t be so noticeable since your shirt already has so much going on. Just be sure to eat or drink something with the same colors as your shirt.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Love the shirt', 'author': 'Thomas A. Overstreet', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Love my tie dyes and this is a bright beautiful one but the cloth is a little course', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very NICE!', 'author': 'Fun Babysitter', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have purchased a few tie-dyed shirts from this merchant. These shirts are great! Nice quality and nice coloring. I gave them also as gifts. If you want a nice shirt that looks great, and washes great, this is it. Wash in cold water, and tumble dry lightly, and put on hanger to dry the rest of the way. They will retain their color and look great. A definite YES!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice pattern', 'author': 'kevin e stenson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love the shirt and quality...shrinks up a bit too much but Still like it', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This the dyed t shirt brings back the inner hippie in me.', 'author': 'Richard Karas', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love the colors, and the comfortable fit.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Really wanted this to work.', 'author': 'Dexbet', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Really wanted this to work. He tried it on, but disliked the buttons (personal preference, nothing wrong with them). I figured I might wear it, so I tried it on (5'4 woman, wear a women's small). It's a very long, straight, narrow shirt that comes straight down completely covering my hips. It's much smaller than I would expect for a men's small -- this to me looks more like a youth large or extra large, but longer. Small seems best suited to a very tall, very skinny teen; definitely for someone with either a long torso (not me!) or small hips. It's a nice shirt, but be aware of the cut.Pros: 100% cotton, thick fabric, softCons: small is very small, strangely long and slim", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Men's Regular-Fit Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt (Available in Big & Tall), Pack of 2
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Deal. Better than Costco. Ordering two more.', 'author': 'Philhj4', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This T-shirt is great. I've been looking for a reasonably priced, every day v-neck T-shirt, 100% cotton, with quality features for some time.FOUND IT!Thus garment is terrific. Delivered early this afternoon; washed it in warm water; dried it at regular high temp; am wearing one of them. Light weight, soft, fits perfect, stripes coincide front and back; looks five times its price.At $8 a garment [$16 for two] this is a fantastic deal. Even better than Costco.Ordering two more.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Actually long!!', 'author': 'L. West', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt (Pack of 2), and I couldn't be more pleased with this wardrobe staple. As someone with a long torso, finding t-shirts that provide sufficient length without sacrificing style can be a challenge, but these shirts exceeded my expectations.The regular-fit design strikes the perfect balance between comfort and a polished look. The fabric feels soft against the skin, offering a pleasant and breathable experience, especially during warmer weather. The V-neck adds a touch of modern style, making these shirts versatile for both casual and slightly dressier occasions.What truly impressed me was the generous length of these shirts. Often, I find that t-shirts tend to ride up, leaving me constantly readjusting. However, these Amazon Essentials shirts provided the perfect amount of length, ensuring that they comfortably sit where they should, even with a longer torso.The fact that they come in a pack of two adds tremendous value to the purchase. It's an economical way to build a reliable collection of shirts that are not only comfortable but also designed with attention to the needs of those with longer torsos.The availability of the Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt in Big & Tall sizes is a thoughtful touch. It reflects an understanding of diverse body types and ensures that individuals of varying sizes can enjoy the same level of comfort and style.In conclusion, these t-shirts have become my go-to choice for everyday wear. The combination of comfort, style, and a length that accommodates a longer torso makes them a standout option. I highly recommend the Amazon Essentials V-Neck T-Shirt to anyone looking for a reliable, comfortable, and stylish addition to their wardrobe.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars The length is awesome', 'author': 'Richard OBrien', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love the longer length of the shirt. And this is on the inside of the waistband, against your skin. Plus they\'re sewn in to the waistband very well so you can\'t yank them out without destroying the briefs. I put them on to see how annoying the tags may or may not be, and that\'s when I discovered the other sewn-in tag - it\'s a "Lacoste" branding tag sewn right across the middle of the rear section of the waistband. This smaller tag is actually more noticeable as you\'re wearing the briefs because the stitching results in an abrasive edge, and it sits right on your spine so you feel it anytime you\'re sitting down. And like the other 5 tags, this little needless tag is sewn in to stay, and cannot be ripped out without damage. Most manufacturers have been making underclothing without sewn-in tags for many years, so it\'s amazing that a brand as well known and established as Lacoste is putting out men\'s briefs with not jut tags, but absolute tag overkill. The briefs themselves seem well made and the fit is good, but do yourself a favor and order a men\'s brief without these annoying tags.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars What you see isn‚Äôt what you get', 'author': 'CAprimefan', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Great feel, look and quality but you aren‚Äôt getting what‚Äôs pictured. They clearly show the croc insignia on the front of the boxers and the ones you get are plain.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable, but short', 'author': 'CKE', 'rating': 4, 'content': "They are soft and comfortable to wear, but the length of the whole boxer brief is short, the legs are short, like they are cutting it short to save on fabric. There is a long tag sewn inside, I cut it off. Overall, they are a little too short for my liking and I won't purchase them again.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars The gator is missing', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The gator üêä is in the picture on the bottom corner of briefs. But the actually ones I recieved don‚Äôt have the gator. Otherwise good.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]
