title: Men's Premium Crew Tee(Pack of 2)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected', 'author': 'J', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I\'ve been trying to find ways to save money, and I was able to buy 3 of these shirts for the price of 1 of my regular shirts. I\'m 6\'0" and 170lbs, which usually means mediums are too short after a few months, and larges are too wide. I bought one shirt in each size just to compare.Medium: Fits great. I\'m not sure how well it will stand the test of time, but there is some room to allow it to shrink some without becoming an issue. It will certainly be long enough to cover everything even if it does shrink quite a bit, but maybe not comfortably. I think a medium is a great "casual going out" shirt.Large: Is quite a bit wider than I need, which is to be expected. After a bunch of washes it might start fitting better, but for now it\'s probably best to be an "at-home" shirt.Both of these shirts are very comfortable and medium thickness. They are more form-fitting than I expected, which was a pleasant surprise. The shirts are by no means truly form-fitting, but unless you order a size too large, they wont make you look like a slobby blob either.Overall I was very impressed with these shirts, and I will be ordering more very soon.-- Update Below --I\'ve had these for at least a month now. One of the shirts is holding up really well, but the other\'s stitching completely fell apart at the bottom, so now it kind of rolls up at the bottom 1/2 inch. Luckily for me it was on the shirt that was too large so I wasn\'t going to go out in it anyway, but these are /very cheap/ shirts. The fabric softness seems to fade after just 1-2 washes as well, but it\'s certainly not the roughest shirt I\'ve ever owned.For the price I still recommend them, but remember that you get what you pay for.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2013', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit', 'author': 'Placeholder', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Order without worry', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Ok but fit is strange but weight of t is good.', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': "The weight of the shirt is thick enough. Comfortable. Shoulders could be a little wider slightly for a large. Sleaves are a little long for me. Can touch forearm with a bend of arm. If hot can cause a zit on forearm bend. Long enough to tuck in and so belly Isn't hanging out if on the roller coaster with arms up. Love the new neon green color. Love the fact it is cotton. Feels really good mostly but a few tugs and bother here and there. Good price, good quality and almost a perfect tshirt but fit is slightly off for me. I bought one but think about buying more. Less expensive than my Columbia shirts. Got some good colors. The tall version of these are perfect for him without being too big everywhere else.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, Soft, Not Thin, Shrinks Slightly After First Wash', 'author': 'KAS', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This is typical Hanes quality-- the fabric is soft (though not as soft as some premium T-shirts) without being thin. That is, if you carry a bit of a spare tire with you, this will show that. It\'s not form fitting, but it\'s not loose and baggy either.I\'m 6\', 175 lbs and the large is a good fit. Even not tucked in, the shirt is snug enough (or, not loose enough) that it catches on my belt and looks like a normal shirt instead of hanging down like a dress. It went from a bit loose to less loose (that is, it didn\'t go from loose to muscle shirt), so not significant, but noticeable to me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely made for tall people', 'author': 'Alex Pillow', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I always have the issue that my shirts ride a little high, even if I get a large (my size), because I'm built pretty lanky. title: Men's Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
X-Temp Performance T-Shirt Pack, Cotton Blend Moisture-Wicking Tees for Men, 2-Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice undershirt', 'author': 'Jamie D.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I‚Äôve had mixed experiences with these shirts. These are well proportioned other than being too short.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent T-shirts true to size fit Very comfortable', 'author': 'nightmagic86', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Bought the two pack of charcoal Gray, These are Excellent T-shirts they are true to size fit. Breathes Well...', 'author': 'Randall Riley', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Purchased two of these recently, looking for a lightweight T-shirt that I could wear around the house during this awful heatwave we're having in the South in summer 2023. I wasn't sure if they'd be both cool and durable, standing up to repeated wearing and washing. So far, they've accomplished both.KUDOS: Well made and not shrinking or changing shape in the wash/dry cycles. Color is holding true after many wash/wear cycles. In terms of their being lightweight enough to stay cool/wick moisture during this heatwave, they are excellent and I find that on hotter days, I find myself looking specifically for them in the closet to put on, choosing them over many others that are good but just a little too thick for a hot day. Cloth does a great job of wicking moisture and keeping you comfy. NOTE: If you're reading this in winter and are looking for something that's short sleeve but a tad warmer, these aren't your go-to because you'll be too cool... you'll want something thicker for that season.CONS: none thus far but if I find they don't hold up all summer, I'll be back to update this review.In short, I enjoy these T-shirts enough that I went back and bought two more of them and think you'll enjoy them, too. I recommend these for sure.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Fits just like snug medium. They might be B stock shirts or something, i like them tho.', 'author': 'daniel  caldwell', 'rating': 3, 'content': "These seem like very nice shirts I would say they fit like a snug medium more like a fitted shift which is nice, might be b stock items or something tho, i got black and see some of them are stitched with grey thread on some parts of the shirt and black on others. the one i have on now the length of the shirt is longer on one side than the other plus some other weird flaws. but i guess i wont complain too much, still nice shirts.I actually thought X temp shirts were the one hundred percent polyester shirts not a mix of polyester and cotton,. Somehow in the description which it states clearly I miss that and I saw some idiots in the questions that gave an answer saying that these were the ones that were 100% polyester and that the cool dry shirts war the blend. Well it turns out it's the exact oppositebut I was looking at these and the cool dry shirts and I can't remember if the idiot was answering the questions on this item or the other item but either way I'm a big stupid idiot for listening to that idiots and not reading the description thoroughly.. but he clearly said the x-temp shirts are designed to keep your cool NR 100% polyester which is not the case. I love the under armour style shirts which are 100% polyester I just hate how the shoulder seam is like Cutler instead of on top of the shoulder on those under armour shirts so I wanted to get a different brand,. that's what I was trying to get here,. something similar to an under armour shirt but this feels like regular cotton for the most partThe good news is I could use a couple regular black t-shirts anyways so I guess I won't get too upset. Next time I know which one is the order if I want a hundred percent polyester,I just can't believe I missed that in the description and went by what some random person said ‚òπÔ∏è", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 6, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable !', 'author': 'Zachary Rappo', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I absolutely love these Hanes x-temps. They are so comfortable and extremely breathable, they are never scratchy on your skin and long lasting comfort all day long.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt/material, terrible quality control and sleeve length', 'author': 'Vince', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I\'m 5\' 7", athletic build, wide back/shoulders. The medium fit fine, as a large would be too baggy around the torso area, and the neck hole would also be too large. Medium fit good and snug. The material is toward the thin side, but not a bad thin. It\'s perfect for working out in and keeps me feeling dry and good. I washed the shirts and there wasn\'t any shrinkage, as it\'s a blend of cotton/polyester.The issue with this shirt is that the short sleeve length is WAY to short. The quality is also very inconsistent in the shirts. My arm\'s aren\'t boulders either. Just athletic with a little more muscle on. So the size of my arms isn\'t making the sleeves ride up.I purchased a pack of white, black and grey. I so far have the white and black. The white shirts have a larger neck hole than the black. The white shirt sleeves go mid-bicep on my arm. The black shirt fits much smaller. The sleeve length is about a half inch to an inch shorter than the white. New update on the steel grey, these are even smaller than the black shirts. These will remain an undershirt, as it looks like a women\'s shirt with how short the sleeves are.This now makes the black shirt sleeve length sitting ABOVE mid bicep, making it look like i have a tight fitting shirt on with super short sleeves.. Just raising my arm a little makes the sleeves ride up more - this is terrible for the gym and in general. The white was more giving, but the black was not.I put the white/black on top of each other, and it\'s very noticeable on the shortened sleeves on the black..These shirts are great other than their quality control, and the inconsistency in the colors/sizes, when ordering the same size. Two colors, both mediums, fitting very different.I know these are priced low, but come on, have some quality control on the product. The black ones will now either become sleeveless shirts for the gym or i\'ll just wear them as a strict undershirt.I will not be buying this product anymore. I wanted to order many of the colors and multiple quantities so I wouldn\'t have to worry about not having a color to wear if it were dirty. I will be looking at other options with sleeve lengths that will be at least mid bicep, or an inch or two past mid bicep. I don\'t need to wear these shirts that make me look like I got it from Baby Gap, when it\'s an Adult Medium..Steel grey medium is smaller yet, as I stated earlier, but leaving this update at the end. I would avoid these shirts unless you\'re a small slim person. If you have ANY muscle, or any athleticism to your body type, stay away.5/29/2017 UPDATE: Decided to give it another chance. I got red and blue, and the blue sleeves are much shorter than the red. Also, one black shirt I previously bought started having loose threads on the bottom, so that shirt is now garbage. The other shirts held up.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This fit perfectly', 'author': 'Amy M Fries', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Hubby was looking for a nicer undershirt to wear under his Hawaiian and Cuban shirt, and if he gets hot he can take off the top shirt and still look nice, this fit the bill. It works both under his nicer button down and as a normal shirt, sizing was perfect, it fit just right', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Hanes X-Temp 2pack of Black Medium T-Shirts Received 04/06/2023', 'author': 'MCS', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'These appear to be decent t-shirts for less than $6 each. Here are some details I‚Äôd like to share with other potential buyers: The shirts I received have sewn-in tags, not screen printed labeling. The tags and packaging do not have any washing instructions. Packaging is not Hanes retail logo packaging. The fit appears to be like an outerwear t shirt, not a form fitting underwear t-shirt. I purchased size medium, I have a 40R chest measurement and wear men‚Äôs size medium in most shirts. If the t-shirts do not shrink I think I can wear them alone as an outerwear t-shirt or under another shirt without any issues. The fit seems to be not too tight and not too loose. Not a baggy fit and not a form fitting underwear t-shirt fit. The length seems long enough to tuck in pants, but not as long as underwear shirts with longer length. Sleeve length is not as long as outerwear t-shirts used to be, but also not as short as many modern shirts which have very short short sleeves. Given the packaging, tags, and lack of laundering instructions, I do question if these are indeed actually Hanes shirts or if they may be counterfeit(?). The fabric looks decent, but some of the sewing work looks less than top quality. I will wash and wear them and hope that they do not fall apart or show defects. I hope this information and thoughts are helpful to others.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Hammer Adult T-Shirt, 2-Pack, Style GH000
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars For athletic, muscular guys, these fit and feel fantastic!', 'author': 'DJ', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought the X-large size hoping they would fit me because I have large traps, chest, and arms and sometimes XL is way to small in one of these areas. Other than a pretty minor issue with their being a little longer than I\'d prefer, the fit is excellent. For working out in particular, I prefer a shirt that fits tight enough to be a bit of a struggle to get in and out of so there\'s never any bunching up or blousing of fabric getting in my way (not to mention I have the body to carry off a skin tight shirt, which at 50 years old I don\'t mind flaunting a little). So I got these in small, and for me at 5\'8", 165 pounds, relatively thick chest and arms v. narrow waist the fit\'s just as a like it. In addition to the fit, the extra thickness of these shirts is really nice. It helps reduce any chaffing in my shoulders/upper back from doing low bar squats, cushions the bar a little better on front squats, and I feel like they help me get a better grip and lower risk of slipping in my should blades when leg driving during bench press.So great fit, great functionality, look good, plus -- as is the norm with Gildan -- really nice price for such high quality. If u like form fitting I probably could buy a Lg', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I like the feel and performance of these shirts and materials.', 'author': 'DPC', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'To be fair I like these performance shirts from Baleaf. I have larger shoulders and a larger chest with long arms. My stomach is equal to or a little smaller than my chest so the shirts hang off my chest and not on my stomach. The shirt does hang a little longer which I like because of riding. I like loose fitting clothes to help keep me cool and keep the dampness away from me as much as possible. I ordered 3x even though I wear 2x from local stores. This shirt was equal to the 2x size. I have gotten different sizes though. They always read 3x some are a little smaller and a some are a little bigger. This shirt feels good and the sleeves are good for me at a little longer. When I stand tall or ride and put my arms out my shoulders tend to pull the sleeves up my arms. That doesn‚Äôt happen on this shirt.The shirts themselves are good quality for me. They have also made it through several wrecks and I still do not have any snags in the material. They have been washed quite a bit with no color loss and they still feel good. It is interesting that I wear them in 90 degree weather for several hours and they wick moisture nicely and they do not cause me to overheat. I also wear them in the fall, and they keep me fairly warm while I am riding. I wear them through 3 seasons, and they feel good across a lot of weather conditions. In and out of rain they dry quickly just like sweating in them.I will most likely order this shirt again because I only have 1. I have not found any issues that I feel take away from the shirt. As always sizes are hit or miss on all clothing so I am not taking anything away from this shirt based on that. I wash it once and it shrank at least 2 sizes, now it's a 2XLT at best. I ordered it for an upcoming vacation, along with a bunch of others from the same brand. I haven even worn the others, as I want to save them in pristine condition for my Vaca. I shouldn't have worn this one either. Never order more than 30 days before you need the item, or you'll go past your return period. I'm asking the seller for a refund. If your going to order a shirt made by Port & Company, order it AT LEAST 2 sizes bigger than you need, because it going to shrink a HUGE amount. Crappiest shirt I've ever bought, and WORST customer service I've ever recieved from a seller on Amazon. Flat out rude and disrespectful. I would not recommend this product, or seller to anyone. Once the product is out of their hands, they are done with you. Not what I expect from Amazon sellers!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Nice thick t-shirt', 'author': 'Jeffrey', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'UPDATE: I bought a second shirt and it is two inches longer than the first. They are both "large tall" sizing. The extra two inches are too long. I like the length of the first one better.SECOND UPDATE: I bought a third shirt to see if I could get the same sizing as the Forest Green one I bought in 2014. But I didn\'t. The sizing is now way larger than it was in 2014, even though all 3 orders were "large tall". I love the thickness of the shirts. But the newest shirt is way too long. Over two inches longer than the first shirt and now the sleeves are two inches longer. This is way too long for even a person my height, 6\'2". I\'m lowering my rating from 4 stars to 3 stars because I am no longer going to be able to order these otherwise good quality shirts because now they make them too long.FIRST REVIEW:The shirt seems to be of good quality and thicker than most t shirts today. It is longer than usual too. I am 6\'2" and it is almost too long. But I like the length. It is thicker than Next Level 3600 shirts which is nice but that makes it wrinkle a little more. But that is ok. It\'s for casual use.It is not as fitted as some shirts but it is not baggy either. I think it\'s a good in between. Because it is not too fitted and not too thin of material it might work well to hide male puffy nipples or gynecomastia.One last note. Some reviewers complained about the neck hole being too small. I like a small neck hole because on most shirts this starts to stretch over time.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 18, 2014', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Quality', 'author': 'Ruth', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Awesome shirt, 100% cotton and nice small neck that isn't stretched out. I use the oversize ones to sleep in, they are soft, thin and big so perfect for me because I am a hot sleeper. The oversized ones I buy are 2x and they are quite oversized I am female 5'2 and 165lbs, this one was a large to wear with my sweats that fit and it fits great. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirts for managing sweat!', 'author': 'OC', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I tend to sweat more than most when playing sports and have used moisture wicking shorts from the major sporting brands. They turned out beautifully. Love the soft material.Would suggest sizing up.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Hanes makes decent running shirts', 'author': 'John Goggans', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These are cheaper than Nike or Brooks. They may not be quite as fancy but they wick the sweat away and you stay dry running in them. They hold up well over time and fit well.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice hot-weather cooling shirt.', 'author': 'GB', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Lightweight, excellent wicking. I wear these for hiking/camping. I sweat a lot in hot summer months. I normally wear size XXL, and I like loose-fitting shirts that allow for good air circulation. I ordered the 3XL and they are just right for me. Loose without being baggy. Fast drying. No funky odor. Soft, lightweight and comfortable.I have seen some reviews complaining about seams coming unstitched. I have not experienced this, after 4 washings. Time will will tell, but if it becomes an issue, I will just re-stitch. No biggie. What I have seen is long threads, which appear to be from not trimming threads after sewing. So I trimmed them. These are inexpensive shirts, so I don't expect the finishing to be top-notch.These shirts appear to be a decent value, and I am ordering a couple more. These would also be a nice base layer for cooler weather.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Thin, clingy and provides decent coverage.', 'author': 'Pemberton Karl', 'rating': 3, 'content': "Before switching to 100% cotton T-shirts I bought these in September 2019 (for $17) and still have them, but I only wore them a handful of times. They were supposed to be for work in a fast-paced environment but felt a bit too thin and tight for comfort without a buffer. Still they are nicely colored and feel smooth to the touch. They will likely be more satisfying once I start wearing them regularly but until then, as decent spares, the ‚ÄúHanes Men's Short Sleeve Cool DRI T-Shirt UPF 50+, Black, Medium (Pack of 2)‚Äù [sic] gets a serviceable 3/5 stars!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars High quality', 'author': 'Shay', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I this is a great high-quality shirt. The feel of it was very nice it‚Äôs polyester. Unfortunately, my husband did not get to wear it because it was not long enough. The shirt was 32 1/2 inches from the back of the collar to the front of the shirt and we needed 33 at minimum even though it didn‚Äôt work out for us I could tell that it was a very nice shirt and it‚Äôs definitely worth $15 for T-shirts. We would buy again if they offered it in a bigger size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable polyester!', 'author': 'Hez', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Best, most comfortable, coolest shirt I've ever owned. I actually bought 7 more in a variety of colors on Hanes website. They had a deal for 5.99 and free shipping on a large purchase liek that. Many people complain about polyester being less comfortable than cotton, or it snags too easily. I'm a plumber, and these are more comfortable than cotton T shirts, and I haven't had any problem with them snagging any worse than cotton. They don't seem to get 'scratchy' when I get glue on them either like with cotton. They aren't noticeably cooler (keep in mind I'm comparing these brand new to my old T shirts that have been worn thin) until you feel a slight breeze. A smaller breeze will cool you off in this shirt than a larger on in a cotton shirt (water evaporates quicker from polyester, hence, it's cooler, hence, it's drier) . I'm 6' and 225lbs, and a large fits me as an undershirt (I got it in large because people said these were pretty big, and I wanted from polyester white undershirts, so I figured it would be a win-win). I bought the safety orange in XL from amazon (I'll put the same review on that product) and it fits me as a normal work shirt very well. (then I bought white, safety green, and safety orange direct from Hanes in XL). I'm very happy with the size, quality, and price. And comment on this color below:White: the key with cheap white shirts is keeping them cheap, thin, and cool, without being see through. no one wants to see your nipples -___-These are the perfect balance. if you get the light just right, you can see through these a little, in the large undershirt size. In the XL regular shirt size, they don't seem to be see-through at all.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2015', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Washed hundreds of times. Look new still', 'author': 'DCshopper', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've been buying these shirts since 2016 to use for work with my scrub pants (nursing home physical therapist, woman). I've never had to replace one. They don't fade or look old, and they air dry super fast. I've washed them hundreds of times, but I've never put them in the dryer. They are super comfortable. The navy blue, black, and deep blue match perfectly with Dickies and Cherokee scrub pants.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Mister Picky is very happy!', 'author': 'Tracy A.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My husband is very picky about his clothes. I bought these for him a while ago and he asked for me. To me that‚Äôs a winner!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Tee for the Money', 'author': 'wolff57', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'For $10 it is hard to go wrong. Sad!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars BEWARE these shirts shrink - A LOT', 'author': 'Tina', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'I purchased these for a family vacation weekend, wanted the softer t-shirts. I am going to put names on them so wanted to wash these first as I figured there would be a bit of shrinkage. Boy, was I surprised! I accidentally only grabbed one of the Med. shirts to toss in the laundry, which I discovered when I was folding the finished load. I held up the medium shirt to fold and was shocked at how small it now was. Yes, I washed them in COLD water as per the instructions! When I compared the difference with the unwashed shirt I was again shocked at just how much it had shrunk. 3 inches in length, 1 inch at the shoulder seam on each side (so 2 inches in width!) , and 1 inch in the length of the sleeve.in addition to the shrinking they are not really softer than a regular t - shirt. The basic quality is okay, not falling apart. I bought 4 shirts total, in various sizes, and they all shrunk. Although many brands makes them, I have found that Nautica makes the best ones. The fit is better than most I have tried, and the fabric feels nicer too, probably due to better cotton? Just get this', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Color', 'author': 'John Tolliver', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Colors not anything like the product displayed. I ordered lightning gold - it is an ugly deli mustard color rather than the bright yellow I was expecting. I exchanged for cheyenne which is more of a rust than the light orange I wanted. If I had know before and what the color really looked like I wouldn't have bought it. Since I already have it I will keep it.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way!', 'author': 'Mark J Mickey', 'rating': 5, 'content': "For a long, long time I have had this very type of shirt. Every time I washed, then dried my shirt, I was always amazed by how perfect this shirt came out of the dryer. All of my cotton or cotton blend T-shirts come out wrinkled and never fold nicely. These shirts are an unusual cotton blend - 95% cotton, 5% elastine. I had never heard of elastine, but I knew that I wanted more of these shirts. They also felt incredible to wear. So, I did a search, first for the make and model of the shirt, to which I discovered these shirts had been discontinued. (Always my luck). Nautica, the manufacturer, still makes many other T-shirts that are 100% cotton or some other cotton blend, but they don't make any other shirts with this mystical fabric elastine. I had never even heard of it before, quite honestly, but it makes all the difference. So, I broadened my search and also searched for just the fabric elastine. I finally found some, on Amazon and on Ebay. They were listed as discontinued items, but they were brand new, so I ordered them from Amazon. They came quickly and they are perfect in every way. In my search, I discovered that this particular fabric appears to only be produced in India. It's comfortable and really great for outdoor activity in the heat. I've primarily used it as an undershirt during the workday and then gone and played a couple of hours of disc golf with it on and it does a solid job of keeping me cool while moving up and down hills and while on the course. There is a tiny pocket on this that I could see being useful, but I have no use for it personally. My only real knock against this shirt is that it runs slightly small. I am 5'10 189 lbs and am consistently caught between a Medium and a Large. I've learned that spyder stuff definitely favors towards large for my body type, but even still its a bit tight in the midsection. That's the only reason for knocking off a star, if you know your size and you like Spyder apparel, this shirt is worth the price.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!', 'author': 'Scott Forbes', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Perfect for running, walking, and working out.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "3.0 out of 5 stars It's not a medium in size", 'author': 'l bates', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I wear a size 38-40 jacket and most of the time I can fit in a medium. I returned it since it was way too tight for my plump gut to fit into.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 27, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Workaround Shirt - But runs small.', 'author': 'Richard', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I use different types of shirts when working out at the gym. This Spyder shirts is by far my favorite. It is light weight and very comfortable to wear. Has a little stretchiness to it. During my 90min workout (freeweights), I did not feel warm/hot. Even forgot I was wearing this shirt. The small zipper/pocket is ok, but not really needed by me.My chest size is 38 1/2 and a hight of 5\'10\'\'. When I ordered the shirt, the product description section did not list the dimensions of each size. I got the medium size and it fits ok. A very tiny bit smaller than what I wanted, but no complaints from me. It feels very comfortable on me.In the Q&A section, it says: "M - Chest Size: 40-42 IN. ". If your chest size is 42 inches, then the medium size will feel a bit tight on you.Overall, great workout sports shirt. Will wear this shirt alot.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G500, Multipack of 1|2|4|6|10, Make Your Own Customized Set!
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great colors, light to medium weight, dependable brand', 'author': 'XRAY', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Being able to buy a bunch of tee shorts in one big economical purchase is nice, and the choice of colors simply cannot be beaten. I have just a ton of old tee shirts, and it's time to get rid of most of them. Some have shrunken, some have faded and/or pilled, some have worn out at the neck band or seams. I went through them to assess whether one brand stood out for having provided long wear and stable shape and size. I can't speak to the durability of this batch of shirts until I wash them a few times, but... Among all brands of tee shirts in my rather large collection - because I never throw anything away - the old Gildans and Carharts were the brands that stood out. Hopefully this new batch of Gildan tees will prove that to be the case again. I came to Amazon specifically looking for Gildans and found this bulk deal attractive. I'll come back and edit if I find them disappointing. So far I have found sizing to be good, and colors to be as close (as close as is reasonable to expect) to the online choices I made.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shirts!', 'author': 'Mommyof2boys', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These turned out to be very nice shirts for my son who needed just plain, solid color t-shirts for his job. They fit very nicely and are true to size. They wash nicely too, however, I wouldn't dry them on high heat as they may shrink. We got to choose our colors, which I really liked and there were plenty of colors to choose from. I also like that we got to choose whether we wanted a pack of 6 or a pack of 10. We chose a pack of 10 and that gave him enough to wear throughout the week, plus a few others the next week, so he's not constantly having to do laundry. These are great shirts that feel nice and look nice, as well.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little small', 'author': 'kati main', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Nice quality, runs a bit small', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it', 'author': 'Aleks Gutman', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The quality, the feel just awesome. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color.', 'author': 'Topgun87', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Size is right on. T-shirt material is comfortable. No shrinkage after washing and drying in dryer', 'author': 'Odie', 'rating': 5, 'content': "soft soft soft. No shrinkage after washing and drying in dryer. Great for men with broad chests and gives a nice clean fit and doesn't scrunch up into armpits which can be unpleasant.These aren't cheap shirts relatively speaking and are almost retail rates but a lot of retail is moving to blends so for a 100% cotton shirt this is great. Fit is spot on and texture feels similar to a super soft tee especially after a wash.If this shirt too pricey then also check out the Anvil 980 and Bella 3001CVC or Bella 3005 (vneck).If you are not too broad in chest then Near Level 3600 isn't bad option but the NL3600 shrink and are very form fitting. Recommend trying in your size and one size up if considering NL3600 for larger men.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 11, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars la talla es perfecta', 'author': 'Boris', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'la calidad de la tela es excelente, recomiendo el articulo sobre todo que la talla es perfecta, yo tengo un peso de 99.79 kg y una altura de 6.07 Pie.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Supposed to be made in America shirts', 'author': 'LuciMc', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I looked under the made in America part on Amazon. title: Mens Distressed Henley Shirts Retro Short Sleeve Tee Shirts Casual Button Down Washed T-Shirts for Men
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, trim fit', 'author': 'Cypherpunk', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'After losing quite a bit of weight (and getting back to more of a muscular, athletic build), I‚Äôve been on the hunt for athletic fit or ‚Äòmuscle‚Äô shirts. This isn‚Äôt really the latter, but it‚Äôs a good choice for those with a slim or athletic build. I got the short sleeve, and the body is longer (making it good for taller guys) and the sleeves are shorter (making it good for guys with more muscular arms). However, it‚Äôs narrower through the body than most tees, but it‚Äôs not super slim, and it‚Äôs not right across the chest (and it‚Äôs not a particularly stretchy fabric, so sizing down probably wouldn‚Äôt work with the henley neck and placket). If you‚Äôre carrying a little extra weight, it‚Äôs not going to show every ounce of fat, but it‚Äôs not cut for guys that are carrying more weight.The shirt is a smooth mid weight cotton, and the seams and buttons are all well made (cheaper shirts can be a little rough here and there, but with an row of buttons, that would end up looking like garbage on this shirt). I would expect this to hold up well. I got the faded blue color (Sky Blue), and it‚Äôs very close to the picture. Very happy with the color and quality.So, good for a general athletic look, but not a ‚Äòmuscle‚Äô shirt for guys who are looking for that type of fit.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, quality material.', 'author': 'Samantha', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Soft , nice material, fits true to size', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shirt', 'author': 'Ilir aliu', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like feels very good fits perfect it's slightly stretchy I'll buy more", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small.', 'author': 'Natalia zcr', 'rating': 3, 'content': "I like the fabric, though its price should be much cheaper, it doesn't worth the money. And it is very fit, runs small. Should have ordered a larger size.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Looking Henley', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I like the "distressed" look of this Henley shirt. I also bought the long sleeve version. They go well with black or gray. They even matched up well with my black and gray "distressed" jeans. The shirt is not heavy. They are about the same weight as a good quality t-shirt and they both come in a 4 or 7 button placket. Nice shirts.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Shirt', 'author': 'Steve', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very nice!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Size runs small', 'author': 'Ben q.', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'It was too tight on me despite my ordering the largest size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Men‚Äôs Henley shirt', 'author': 'Doug', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The shirt is okay. I just don‚Äôt like how far the buttons go down the shirt. It‚Äôs comfortable though. It didn‚Äôt shrink when I washed it. I guess if you like this style it‚Äôs worth getting.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice', 'author': 'Richard', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Fits good', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Shirt', 'author': 'Jeff Saussele', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Not as "distressed" as the pictures show, but still nice. Great fit and really nice material. Highly recommended!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: True Classic Tees | Premium Fitted Men's T-Shirt | Crew Neck | Singles & Packs
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fit and comfort', 'author': 'CrisM', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These shorts are true to size. I wear XL in many brands and this one is no different other than the fact that it‚Äôs fits the arm and chest area very well and leaves a little room for the stomach area giving a flattering silhouette. The length is also well proportioned that it doesn‚Äôt leave you looking boxy. The material is very soft and did not have any shrinkage from being in the washing machine and tumble dried on low heat. The only negative is that I wish the black was a little darker and not look like it was faded from regular washing.The 4 pack in the picture of the ad should be darker colors. However, what arrived were white, heather blue instead of the grey. Too much of a hassle to send back.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing buy!', 'author': 'Krenee', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love the way these looked on my husband! Highly recommend. They were true to size and hugged his biceps in the right places! Perfect fit shirt! Very soft', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shirts', 'author': 'Derek Zoolander', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Still a little too tight to my liking but that‚Äôs just more motivation for me to get my body tighter so I don‚Äôt have to spend a lot of money for t shirts. Should have gotten a xxl but they are very soft and comfortable and for sure tight around the upper body', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and look good.', 'author': 'Wayne O.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was skeptical at first because of all of the advertisements I was seeing, and the price was a little steep, but these are very comfortable, they look and feel great. Long enough to stay tucked in as an undershirt, also snug and stretchy enough to be worn as an undershirt without visible bunching or bulging. Great looking as a t-shirt worn untucked. I have only owned them for a couple of weeks, so I can not comment on how durable or long lasting they will be, but I'm very happy with these shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars **Best Tshirt Hands Down**', 'author': 'Drew wallace', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is probably the most quality shirt I have ever owned. My wife loves the way they make me look. I really don't know how they did it but these shirts make it look like you work out! I am rocking the Dad bod and they truly hide the gut. I have been wearing them for 6 months now and they have yet to wear out. I know these things cost a lot of money to some but I caught them on sale and they are worth every penny. I would say they run a little small so you may need to size up, but it's because of the way they fit to you and hug all the right places. 10/10 would purchase again!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality', 'author': 'Chelsea Whitmill', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I buy these for my husband and teenage son. I am so glad they‚Äôre available on Amazon now as we used to order from their website directly. We have bought several bundles. They are soft, they fit well and don‚Äôt fade or shrink in the wash.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Listen to the reviews about the quality control!', 'author': 'Yosomboon C.', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I was skeptical about ordering True Classic because of the reviews I‚Äôve read about their quality control. I wanted to give them a shot anyways so I ordered the 5 pack of XXL black shirts. After I tried it on it was way too big from the XXL I‚Äôm accustomed to from Into The AM. I returned it and bought a 6 pack of assorted colors in XL as recommended by Amazon and those were so tight on me that I looked like a sausage. I returned those and bought a 3rd pack of XXL assorted colors. I figured after I wear them once and gave them a wash they‚Äôll shrink to down to fit like a glove, but while trying them on The black shirt fresh out of the package was all faded while the collar was solid black. Long story short I‚Äôm going to return these for the 3rd time and spend $30 more for Into the AM assorted packs like I did in the past. I‚Äôve had into the AM shirts for close to 3 years and they‚Äôve fit me as well as they did on day one and aged very well with minimal fade.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good shirt, bad stitching', 'author': 'Chris', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'UPDATE: After this review, I was contacted and asked if I would like a refund of my order. I declined and said the shirt is usable because my wife sewed it so I felt a refund was unnecessary. However, the seller insisted and offered to send me a replacement shirt, which I.accepted. The replacement has no defect.I increased the rating from 3 stars to 4 stars for excellent customer service and standing behind the product.Original review:This shirt fits well; tight fit in the upper body (chest, shoulders, arms) and looser in the waist.However, the stitching at the armpit was poorly done and there was an opening just under the left armpit.I was going to return it but my wife liked how the shirt fit me and she wanted me to wear it so she just sewed it up.These are well-designed but poorly made and not worth the price, in my opinion.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Solid material, varying sizes', 'author': 'Max Rodgers', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These t-shirts are incredibly comfy and I love all of the colors that the variety pack came with. I have a fairly long torso and shirts tend to be on the shorter side if they don't fit. I found that 3/5 of the shirts in this pack fit me perfectly, but the other 2 are a bit short in the torso. The quality of the material feels really nice; however, I have noticed a few stitches coming out of place after about 4-months of wearing these. I'd like to see the consistency of these shirts be a bit higher to really give them 5-stars, but compared to my other t-shirts I think the quality is definitely there.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great Shirts!', 'author': 'Q', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love these shirts. They fit great and hug the body just right. The only downside is there are some minor imperfections in the stitching quality so I have hanging threads. The other problem I had, unrelated to quality, is that one of my five shirts in the pack was the wrong size so I had to contact Amazon. They refunded me the cost of the shirt, but that color was the main reason for my order lol. All in all, great, comfortable shirts!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

I ordered an XL and am glad it\'s 100% cotton as I knew I\'d have to shrink it down to my correct size. .....I\'m 6\' tall, have a 44" chest, 35" waist, athletic build, and prefer my T\'s to be a bit roomier at the torso, but fitted at the sleeves. I tried on the shirt right when I received it, pre-washed. Very nice and soft, but like I mentioned, heavy enough so as not to be see thru. .....a bit too big at the torso and biceps tho. I then washed it in warm water and medium heat dried it....it did shrink as expected, and actually fits even better now.....not as baggy as before and the sleeves almost snug on the biceps......looks good, but I will wash it again in warmer water and dry it at a higher heat, just to test out. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great design and fit', 'author': 'James', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was debating between Large and X-Large and I went with the X-Large (this is always my problem with t-shirts depending on the cut and style the size that fits me will vary).The fit was perfect around the shoulders and arms. Very light and comfy, it is great for summertime. The quality and texture are awesome too. I have purchased and returned so many different brands in the past that I gave up on finding a good quality v-neck t-shirt. It is very hard to find a v-neck style that fits your build. I have wide shoulders, so they either look like I am wearing a tent if they are too big or look like I stole a 6-year old's t-shirt to wear it. I got the three t-shirt bundles and only tried the black one. I can't wait to wash them to see if they shrink or not, then decide if my next purchase will be an X-Large or maybe a Large if I want a tighter look.Overall, I have now become a fan of the product and the company. Everything you see in the stores these days is made of thin, flimsy fabric that doesn't hold its shape. These tee shirts have some body to them and hold their shape. I also love the quality construction.I expected this shirt to shrink in the laundry, so I ordered a size with room to shrink, and it has shrunken down to the perfect size for me.The only thing that bugs me is the sleeve design. It's great for people who never have to raise their arms (or even reach forward) all day long. But for those of us who are more active, the sleeves are restrictive of upward arm movement, and it feels like the whole shirt is restricting my ability to reach upward. This is because they're sewn into the body of the shirt at a downward angle. On my older tee shirts, the sleeves are sewn into the body of the shirt at a right angle, and upward arm movement is completely effortless in those shirts. I wish someone would bring back that sleeve design because I miss it!Meanwhile, I like these well enough to buy more. Overall, they're great tee shirts.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit.', 'author': 'Nicolas Cramer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It is a great shirt that fits perfectly. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Loves it', 'author': 'Brittanee And Tarrell', 'rating': 5, 'content': "He loves the shirt. He is 5'10 and 230 and it fits him perfectly. Although many brands makes them, I have found that Nautica makes the best ones. The fit is better than most I have tried, and the fabric feels nicer too, probably due to better cotton? Just get this', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Color', 'author': 'John Tolliver', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Colors not anything like the product displayed. I ordered lightning gold - it is an ugly deli mustard color rather than the bright yellow I was expecting. I exchanged for cheyenne which is more of a rust than the light orange I wanted. If I had know before and what the color really looked like I wouldn't have bought it. Since I already have it I will keep it.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way!', 'author': 'Mark J Mickey', 'rating': 5, 'content': "For a long, long time I have had this very type of shirt. Every time I washed, then dried my shirt, I was always amazed by how perfect this shirt came out of the dryer. All of my cotton or cotton blend T-shirts come out wrinkled and never fold nicely. These shirts are an unusual cotton blend - 95% cotton, 5% elastine. I had never heard of elastine, but I knew that I wanted more of these shirts. They also felt incredible to wear. So, I did a search, first for the make and model of the shirt, to which I discovered these shirts had been discontinued. (Always my luck). Nautica, the manufacturer, still makes many other T-shirts that are 100% cotton or some other cotton blend, but they don't make any other shirts with this mystical fabric elastine. I had never even heard of it before, quite honestly, but it makes all the difference. So, I broadened my search and also searched for just the fabric elastine. I finally found some, on Amazon and on Ebay. They were listed as discontinued items, but they were brand new, so I ordered them from Amazon. They came quickly and they are perfect in every way. In my search, I discovered that this particular fabric appears to only be produced in India. title: Originals Mens Big and Tall Cotton T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, long, sleeves too short', 'author': 'GameandCook', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Inexpensive staple shirt. Soft material, it's a good enough thickness to wear alone. The sleeves are on the short side, feels like cap sleeves on a big shirt. Plenty long and won't ride up. Doesn't have moisture wicking. If you're not big and tall, probably just get the normal Originals.This is a review of Hanes Men's Originals T-Shirt, Lightweight Cotton Tee, Big & Tall Sizes, Trekking Grey", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy... wish had gone with normal size', 'author': 'Peeps9788', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I got this in size large tall for my husband who is 6\'2" and 175 pounds. He though the actual material for the shirt felt great.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Big, comfy shirt!', 'author': 'Johnny', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Ordered this shirt primarily for use during my physical therapy sessions. Once we got it and he tried it on, it nearly came down to his knees lol', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable tshirt', 'author': 'GradSchoolReviewer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is a nice comfortable tshirt. It‚Äôs nothing fancy and for me it‚Äôs more of a wear around the house or for a walk type of item, but it‚Äôs a nice color and style.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my tall son', 'author': 'Mrs. Renfro', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My teenaged son has skyrocketed over the last year or so and all his shirts are starting to be too short. The tall version of these are perfect for him without being too big everywhere else.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, Soft, Not Thin, Shrinks Slightly After First Wash', 'author': 'KAS', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This is typical Hanes quality-- the fabric is soft (though not as soft as some premium T-shirts) without being thin. It\'s durable and fits well. It does have a small tag (if that bothers you, I haven\'t noticed it) and the Large size is a good fit for an athletic frame. That is, if you carry a bit of a spare tire with you, this will show that. It\'s not form fitting, but it\'s not loose and baggy either.I\'m 6\', 175 lbs and the large is a good fit. The "Tall" part makes this T-shirt too tall if I pull the hem all the way down, but if I tuck it, it\'s perfect to keep me from flashing my goods every time I bend over. Even not tucked in, the shirt is snug enough (or, not loose enough) that it catches on my belt and looks like a normal shirt instead of hanging down like a dress. The arms don\'t hug my biceps, but they don\'t make them looks like hotdogs down a hallway either.Do be aware that this shrinks slightly after the first wash/dry cycle. It went from a bit loose to less loose (that is, it didn\'t go from loose to muscle shirt), so not significant, but noticeable to me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely made for tall people', 'author': 'Alex Pillow', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I always have the issue that my shirts ride a little high, even if I get a large (my size), because I'm built pretty lanky. So getting this shirt definitely solved that issue! I've very very long, a bit more than expected, but that's the goal right! It works really well when I tuck it in as well.overall the shirt is super soft and comfortable, and solves my issues of having shirts ride up too high", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Large tall size is too tall', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Fits similar to other large shirts in the shoulders but I\'m 6\'4" and the shirt goes down to the bottom of my crotch.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Slim fit but nice shirt', 'author': 'KP', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'My husband typically wears a size large in tees. So I ordered a large tall in this one expecting it to fit.I was a little surprised at how slim this is. Now, I think this is the hazard of "tall" tees because we have had this issue with other brands too.The fit in his shoulders was perfect but it was way too tight in the waist. I will admit my husband isn\'t slim and has a little belly so he did not like this shirt because it was way too tight.As an undershirt it may have worked but he just didn\'t like the way it looked on him.The quality is nice and I really like the vintage style label inside. It really is a nice "classic" tee.I ended up giving it to my son who typically wears a medium in tees and aside from being a little too long it fit him well. He is very slim though.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

Here's my breakdown of the product:Comfort and Fit: The tee fits exceptionally well. It's true to size and offers great mobility, which is crucial for my daily runs. The fabric is soft and breathable, making it comfortable for long wear, especially during intense workouts or hot days.Performance: In terms of performance, this tee lives up to the adidas reputation. It wicks away sweat efficiently, keeping me dry and comfortable throughout my runs. The material also seems durable and has held up well after several washes without any sign of wear or tear.Design and Style: The design is sleek and modern. I appreciate the minimalistic branding and the cut of the tee, which is flattering yet functional. It's versatile enough to be worn for workouts or as casual wear.Color Issue: However, there's a slight issue with the color representation. I ordered this tee expecting a vibrant red, as shown in the product images, but the tee I received is more of an orange hue. While it's still an attractive color, it wasn't what I was expecting, which was a bit disappointing.Value for Money: Despite the color discrepancy, the tee is a good value for money. It's well-constructed, performs excellently during physical activities, and has the quality assurance of the adidas brand.Overall, I'm giving the adidas Men's Own The Run Tee a solid 4 stars. It's an excellent performance tee with all the right features for active wear. However, be mindful of the color variation if you're particular about that aspect. I'd recommend it for anyone looking for a high-quality running tee, but with a note of caution regarding the color.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good', 'author': 'Sixto Trivino', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Good', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Poor workmanship on my shirt', 'author': 'C. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, trim fit', 'author': 'Cypherpunk', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'After losing quite a bit of weight (and getting back to more of a muscular, athletic build), I‚Äôve been on the hunt for athletic fit or ‚Äòmuscle‚Äô shirts. This isn‚Äôt really the latter, but it‚Äôs a good choice for those with a slim or athletic build. I got the short sleeve, and the body is longer (making it good for taller guys) and the sleeves are shorter (making it good for guys with more muscular arms). However, it‚Äôs narrower through the body than most tees, but it‚Äôs not super slim, and it‚Äôs not right across the chest (and it‚Äôs not a particularly stretchy fabric, so sizing down probably wouldn‚Äôt work with the henley neck and placket). If you‚Äôre carrying a little extra weight, it‚Äôs not going to show every ounce of fat, but it‚Äôs not cut for guys that are carrying more weight.The shirt is a smooth mid weight cotton, and the seams and buttons are all well made (cheaper shirts can be a little rough here and there, but with an row of buttons, that would end up looking like garbage on this shirt). I would expect this to hold up well. I got the faded blue color (Sky Blue), and it‚Äôs very close to the picture. I also like that this shirt supports the National Park Foundation.. which keeps our natural beauty flourishing.I would highly recommend National Park Foundation Casual Novelty T-Shirt!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

Instead I got a shirt that feels like a women's swimsuit: smooth like an artificial fiber and *very* stretchy. It's just not a material I'm used to wearing as a shirt.If you can get past the odd choice of material it's a nice-looking shirt. I wanted to give them a shot anyways so I ordered the 5 pack of XXL black shirts. After I tried it on it was way too big from the XXL I‚Äôm accustomed to from Into The AM. I returned it and bought a 6 pack of assorted colors in XL as recommended by Amazon and those were so tight on me that I looked like a sausage. I returned those and bought a 3rd pack of XXL assorted colors. I figured after I wear them once and gave them a wash they‚Äôll shrink to down to fit like a glove, but while trying them on The black shirt fresh out of the package was all faded while the collar was solid black. Long story short I‚Äôm going to return these for the 3rd time and spend $30 more for Into the AM assorted packs like I did in the past. I‚Äôve had into the AM shirts for close to 3 years and they‚Äôve fit me as well as they did on day one and aged very well with minimal fade.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good shirt, bad stitching', 'author': 'Chris', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'UPDATE: After this review, I was contacted and asked if I would like a refund of my order. I declined and said the shirt is usable because my wife sewed it so I felt a refund was unnecessary. However, the seller insisted and offered to send me a replacement shirt, which I.accepted. The replacement has no defect.I increased the rating from 3 stars to 4 stars for excellent customer service and standing behind the product.Original review:This shirt fits well; tight fit in the upper body (chest, shoulders, arms) and looser in the waist.However, the stitching at the armpit was poorly done and there was an opening just under the left armpit.I was going to return it but my wife liked how the shirt fit me and she wanted me to wear it so she just sewed it up.These are well-designed but poorly made and not worth the price, in my opinion.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Solid material, varying sizes', 'author': 'Max Rodgers', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These t-shirts are incredibly comfy and I love all of the colors that the variety pack came with. I have a fairly long torso and shirts tend to be on the shorter side if they don't fit. I found that 3/5 of the shirts in this pack fit me perfectly, but the other 2 are a bit short in the torso. The quality of the material feels really nice; however, I have noticed a few stitches coming out of place after about 4-months of wearing these. I'd like to see the consistency of these shirts be a bit higher to really give them 5-stars, but compared to my other t-shirts I think the quality is definitely there.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great Shirts!', 'author': 'Q', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love these shirts. They fit great and hug the body just right. The only downside is there are some minor imperfections in the stitching quality so I have hanging threads. The other problem I had, unrelated to quality, is that one of my five shirts in the pack was the wrong size so I had to contact Amazon. They refunded me the cost of the shirt, but that color was the main reason for my order lol. All in all, great, comfortable shirts!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Mens Distressed Henley Shirts Retro Short Sleeve Cotton Slim Fit Tee Summer Casual Button Down Washed T-Shirts
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly well-crafted and comfortable ‚Äì just ensure you get the sizing right', 'author': 'Michael Douglas', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I‚Äôve owned a lot of Henley‚Äôs. Some I‚Äôve liked, some I‚Äôve tossed after a year or two. This one appears to be a keeper. Though it‚Äôs not going to compete with high-end $100 brands, it‚Äôs surprisingly as well-made as some of them.What‚Äôs to like: it‚Äôs made from a good grade of heavy cotton (not the flimsy stuff) and, importantly, attention has been paid to the construction. Though double-stitching is typically not found at this price point, this Henley has double-stitching around the collar, sleeves, and waist (see pics). All of which adds up to durability. It looks good and fits properly and comfortably. With the distressed look it certainly goes well with a pair of jeans and can be worn straight out of the package with only light creasing that eases with use.What to be mindful of: First, Sizing. Though true-to fit, you may want to opt for a size up, e.g. if shirts you find with are a mix of, say, Large and XL, then choose XL. Second, though the manufacturer recommends dry cleaning (see label in pic) at this price point I‚Äôd go with machine washing and tumble dry on LOW (after all, it‚Äôs cotton).', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Henley in Grey! Medium is true to fit for me.', 'author': 'Robert K. Sischka', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm always between a large and medium when it comes to sizing. I checked out the sizing chart and went for the medium and it was spot on. This Henley is well made and arrived without having any odor at all, which is nice as I didn't need to air it out. It appears solidly made and the 'short sleeves' are generously long, unlike some which can be too short. The distressed look is great. Love the Grey color. Some slim fits can be a little snug; however this one is not, leaving you jut enough room to move comfortably. Great pricing for the quality...this one's a keeper!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking Heley - good sizing', 'author': 'ReyVn Cheshirefox', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The construction looks good and teh fabric is osft and comfortable. The distressed look dyeing makes for a nice lived in casual look.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice & comfortable', 'author': 'MHelmerick', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This shirt is really comfortable according to my husband. I got it for him because I liked the color and the style. I was concerned about the description as a slim fitting shirt and sized up for him. It‚Äôs also 100% cotton which could also cause some shrinkage. He said the shirt is a little baggy because I ordered a size up, but he was happy with the fit. His usual size is an XL and I got him a XXL. He‚Äôs 5‚Äô11‚Äù and about 240 lbs.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well constructed, and great quality', 'author': 'Mlynn_strides', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I got this shirt for my husband, he loves it. You can tell it‚Äôs made with quality material, and breathable fabric. Love the distressed vintage look of this shirt. My husband is 6‚Äù0‚Äô, 150lbs and I went with a size small, it fits perfectly. Definitely true to size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great favorite shirt look', 'author': "Shane O'Neill", 'rating': 5, 'content': "I typically wear a medium and this shirt fits me true to size, only slightly snug in the chest. As it is cotton, wearing it for only a short while stretches it enough to be completely comfortable. The cotton is thick and soft and wears very smooth on the skin. The neck is large enough not to feel constricting but isn't a giant hole either. I would only complain that the arms are a little small for me around my biceps which isn't typical for a medium shirt. I love this shirt otherwise; the color, the worn distressed look, and how comfortable it is. I'm going to see how much I like it after a few washings before I buy from this vendor again. So far, everything is great.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great look and fit; material thicker than expected', 'author': 'Andy Freede', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I really like the look and fit of this shirt overall. As opposed to some other "distressed" look shirts I\'ve gotten on Amazon, the distressed elements are built into the material themselves, and not some sort of fake distressed printing on the surface.That said, the material itself is a bit thicker and heavier than your average t-shirt. It\'s almost bordering on denim in the material weight. However, this isn\'t a drawback for me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': False}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, trim fit', 'author': 'Cypherpunk', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'After losing quite a bit of weight (and getting back to more of a muscular, athletic build), I‚Äôve been on the hunt for athletic fit or ‚Äòmuscle‚Äô shirts. This isn‚Äôt really the latter, but it‚Äôs a good choice for those with a slim or athletic build. I got the short sleeve, and the body is longer (making it good for taller guys) and the sleeves are shorter (making it good for guys with more muscular arms). However, it‚Äôs narrower through the body than most tees, but it‚Äôs not super slim, and it‚Äôs not right across the chest (and it‚Äôs not a particularly stretchy fabric, so sizing down probably wouldn‚Äôt work with the henley neck and placket). If you‚Äôre carrying a little extra weight, it‚Äôs not going to show every ounce of fat, but it‚Äôs not cut for guys that are carrying more weight.The shirt is a smooth mid weight cotton, and the seams and buttons are all well made (cheaper shirts can be a little rough here and there, but with an row of buttons, that would end up looking like garbage on this shirt). I would expect this to hold up well. I got the faded blue color (Sky Blue), and it‚Äôs very close to the picture. It's not loose or tight and it keeps a nice shape and has a good sleeve length that isn't too long. The best thing about it is the quality. For the price, it's very good. High quality cotton and very good printing. It's very comfortable to wear and stands out when compared to the quality and boxy fit of many generic t-shirts I. have tried. Very happy!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': "3.0 out of 5 stars Quality is good.... Bet you wouldn't have had this mix up.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Cool shirt', 'author': 'Dant√©', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The graphics are cool and looks great. The design and colors are true to the photos - I really like the design - I know it's just personal preference, but it's really nice. The design is also well-integrated into the shirt so it shouldn't wear out too quickly.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Love the casue but it was a bit tight', 'author': 'Dr. Quantum', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I ordered this as my family and I love to go to and support our national parks. I got the purple Grand Canyon t-shirt. Overall, it was a bit stiff and a tad tighter so order a size larger. I ended up washing it a few times and while it didn't shrink (yea!) the fabric did start to soften up. I loved the front design and color as well. It was also a bit on the heavier side so while I hesitate to wear it in the summer heat (think very hot US southern state), this will be great for the fall and spring temps ( 50 to 70 degrees F).", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Cool Shirt', 'author': 'Crackerbat', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Love this shirt design and the color. I love the old-school lettering/style, the array of colors (gold/pink/greens) and the tan base-fabric color. It fits as expected - great for casual events or lifting weights. The fabric is pretty thick, and not super soft, but it doesn't make me itchy like other shirts made purely from cotton. I also like that this shirt supports the National Park Foundation.. which keeps our natural beauty flourishing.I would highly recommend National Park Foundation Casual Novelty T-Shirt!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

Instead I got a shirt that feels like a women's swimsuit: smooth like an artificial fiber and *very* stretchy. Sort of feels like other polyester shirts I wear to the gym, but made from a thicker material. I don't hate it, though. It's just not a material I'm used to wearing as a shirt.If you can get past the odd choice of material it's a nice-looking shirt. The 'swimsuit' stretch gives it a fitted look, and the navy blue is a deep, deep blue that's suitable for kind of a 'nice casual' look. I'd recommend wearing it with an undershirt to avoid chafing, but it's otherwise a flattering look.Men's size L was true to size with generous room in the belly for a 'fitted' shirt.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Comfort for Active Teens', 'author': 'Chef Bobby', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve T-Shirt has become a staple in my teenager's wardrobe, and for good reason. The slim-fit design offers a modern look without sacrificing comfort, making it versatile for various occasions. Whether he's lounging at home or out with friends, this shirt remains a go-to choice. If you're in search of a reliable and long-lasting long-sleeve tee for your teenager, I highly recommend giving this one a try. They have a thick and sharp look, but are still quite comfortable.Now I must be clear and tell you that they indeed shrink quite a bit after tumble drying, but that is expected from 100% cotton. With my thin frame being as tall as I am, the shirts are flattering and snug at the chest and arms the way I want, but are still quite short in length.If you don't tuck in your shirts the way I do, go with the large. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars thick, high quality', 'author': 'Ivan A Millich II', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'thick, high quality', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great T-Shirts', 'author': 'Cep', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We don‚Äôt have a Costco in our area and I missed being able to buy a REAL undershirt instead of the ‚Äúwhite paper fabric‚Äù you get with the two big names in undershirts. These t-shirts are super extra long and after lots of washing, they will shrink but then they fit like other brands tall sizes when they are brand new! In the pic, the black is a brand new Basix T, the burgundy is a Basix T which has had the daylights washed out of it and the tan is a Carhartt. After a lot of washing the Carhartt feels like you're wearing a burlap sack and they have no streachiness, causing them to come untucked easily. The Carhartt neck also stretches out and won't shrink back. (See the picture.) The Basix T is still soft and comfortable, the neck shrinks back down when washed and they can stretch easily with normal movements helping them stay tucked in. BTW you DO need to get a size larger than you normally wear. My only wish is that they had a front pocket, but I can deal with that if I'm not tucking in my shirt all day! üòÄ I started off with one at a time to check my fit and now I have almost 20, I don't even wear the Carhartt any more.
